Our hospitable server, Christine, exhibited exceptional proficiency in her role, expertly guiding us through the menu, taking into consideration my dietary restrictions, and offering insightful recommendations. Both my companion and I opted for the steak, which proved to be an unparalleled gastronomic experience, characterized by impeccable preparation, generous portions, and an overall delectability that left us both satiated but unable to complete our meals. My subsequent visits to Scottsdale will undoubtedly include a return to this exceptional dining venue."

"It was a truly remarkable dining experience, characterized by an exceptional level of service that greatly surpassed my expectations, with a steak that was cooked to perfection, specifically tailored to my individual preferences, accompanied by an array of delectable side dishes, including asparagus that was prepared with great skill and care, which contributed to an overall culinary delight that was thoroughly enjoyed by myself and my son, who had the opportunity to sample a Hawaiian pizza that was crafted with great attention to detail and flavor, and of course, the cheesecake that followed was nothing short of extraordinary, truly a masterpiece that left a lasting impression on our taste buds."

I am SO excited to have this new Michael's so close to home!!!  I'm an avid baker and love crafts so I visit Michael's almost on a weekly basis.  I really like this store!  They have a good selection and the sales people are extremely helpful and friendly.  Even during the very busy Christmas season, the sales associated greeted everyone with a smile and were happy to help in any way they could.  They would even use their phones to scan online coupons since my Windows phone won't bring them up properly.  That's going above and beyond!\n\nI have shopped at every Michael's store within a 50 mile radius of Waxhaw and it's the service that sets this store apart from the rest.  Because of that, I give this store 5 stars because, for me, it's \"as good as it gets\" for Michael's.

Always an exceptional venue for a morning repast; I wholeheartedly endorse the diminutive, bite-sized ranch potatoes, which are meticulously seasoned and proffer an unparalleled gustatory experience. Additionally, their banana nut bread, which accompanies numerous entrees, boasts an extraordinary level of moisture and flavor. Furthermore, the eatery employs a service style analogous to that of Bubba Gump, whereupon, in the event that one requires aid, a simple turn of the sign bearing the inscription "stop forest, stop!" will suffice. Moreover, the staff adopts a dual approach to signaling patron's needs, utilizing both a cheerful egg countenance and its antithesis, a melancholy egg visage, to facilitate prompt and efficient service.

I've been going to Tea Infusions since literally the day before the opened. They happened to have the door open and my boyfriend and I wandered in because we were all excited. Unfortunately, we had to come back the next day:)

I love tea and I love their selection. Genmaicha, Blueberry White, Monks Blend, and Moroccan Mint Green Tea are my favorites. I'm really impressed with their Moroccan Mint as it tasted like the tea I actually had in Morocco. I can't say that for the versions most other stores and brands sell. They also get all kinds of interesting seasonal flavors in.

Chrissy(owner), Steve, Tina and the rest of the staff have always been very friendly with me. Always willing to honor my weird requests like layering my whip cream into my blueberry pomegranate tea smoothie.

I love all the little teapots and things they have for sale. Which reminds me I need to go in and get one of their cups with the infusers for work as I've already stashed up on all of their loose tea tins.

It's great too see they are now partnering with Lulu's cupcakes another yummy local independent. Now I can get my tea and cake:)

```
It has been my utmost pleasure to engage in an endeavour of such monumental significance, specifically pertaining to the procurement of a hairstylist who possesses the proficiency to execute a fade with impeccable precision, thereby culminating in an unparalleled sense of euphoria and satisfaction. Furthermore, the presence of a pool table within the establishment serves as an added bonus, providing patrons with an opportunity to indulge in a delightful respite from the rigors of daily life. It is truly a unique and refreshing experience, one that I would highly recommend to any individual seeking a haven of relaxation and recreation. Lastly, I must extend my sincerest gratitude to Tiff and her team for their warm hospitality, as well as the delectable refreshments that were graciously offered to us. Indeed, the ambiance and amenities presented here are nothing short of exceptional, and I would venture to assert that it would be remiss of me not to encourage others to partake in the enjoyment of such a magnificent setting.
```
Please let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

"Excellent! Adore this venue, and indeed, what took me such an extended period of time to visit? As a local of Madison, numerous acquaintances were taken aback by my lack of experience here. I, myself, am perplexed. On a crowded Saturday evening a fortnight ago, I was informed of a thirty-minute delay. Not an issue, we secured a spot at the bar and placed an order - naturally, two old fashioneds. Remarkably delectable and promptly crafted directly before our eyes. Scarcely had sufficient time to settle our tab and we received a notification via text message (an innovative method, I must say) that a table was now available. Sat in the recently constructed section, and I must admit, I struggled to peruse the menu due to inadequate visual acuity. Nonetheless, not a concern, as Yelp reviews had previously enlightened me on the optimal dishes to select; and, assuredly, we were not let down. We began with the customary cheese curds. Extraordinary! Surprisingly ethereal for curds and flawlessly melted. Both of us opted for burgers - she, the Wisconsin, which she thoroughly relished, and I, the Old Fashioned burger. Both lived up to their acclaimed status, and I am eager to return, though uncertain whether to stick with the burger or explore the vast array of other visually appealing options. Additionally, I sampled a couple of beers from their extensive selection."

"Hailing from Omaha, Nebraska and eager to initiate the day with a nutritious indulgence, we opted for the verdant elixir known as 'the greenie' and were thoroughly impressed by its delectable flavor profile. The welcoming ambiance of the establishment was further complemented by the exceptional clientele service we received, eliciting our sincere gratitude and ensuring our future return."
So far, it's the best ribeye steak I've ever had.  Very juicy and tasty.  Can't go wrong with this dish.

Searched out this place for some comfort food.
Love hotdogs so I went for the 2 chili cheese dogs and fries combo
The hotdogs were great and the chili perfect.
To top it off the fries were fresh cut and cooked to perfection.
Makes my list of must go to when I am in the area again.
Only regret is not trying their ice cream

"I am thoroughly delighted that we opted to return to Tomo, as our dining experience today was nothing short of exceptional. The Popcorn Lobster Roll was an unmitigated triumph, boasting an impressive flavor profile that has secured its place as a new favorite among my culinary preferences. The Spicy Ninja Roll was equally satisfying, offering a unique fusion of spicy and savory sensations that effectively simulated the essence of jalapeÃ±o poppers within a sushi roll format. However, my enthusiasm for the meal was slightly tempered by the underwhelming performance of the monkey balls, which despite their popularity among some patrons, fell somewhat short of my expectations. Although I can appreciate their novelty as a mushroom-based appetizer, I would not personally recommend them to others. Nevertheless, Tomo's diverse menu offerings cater admirably to diverse tastes, ensuring that even those who do not share my fondness for sushi can find suitable alternatives. One minor drawback did arise, pertaining to the margarita I ordered, which was served in a tall glass and possessed a strong, almost overpowering flavor reminiscent of concentrated margarita mix. In light of this experience, I may opt for sake in the future."

"This marked the second occasion within a fortnight that I had been compelled to replace my windshield, and, subsequent to the unsatisfactory experience I had endured during the initial instance, I opted to exercise greater autonomy in selecting a service provider, thus culminating in my decision to patronize Star Windshield, despite their absence from my insurer's roster of approved vendors. Throughout the process, the staff exhibited exceptional cordiality and adaptability, accommodating my multiple schedule changes and alterations with ease. Furthermore, Mike, the individual responsible for attending to my vehicle, executed his duties with remarkable proficiency, eliciting my unwavering satisfaction. Additionally, it is worth mentioning that, approximately five years prior, I had availed myself of their window tinting services, and, since then, I have not encountered a single issue or concern."

My spouse and I opted for the I love Seoul burger, which proved to be an astounding culinary experience. I elected to have mine served atop a bed of rice rather than the traditional bun, and this unconventional choice yielded an unparalleled level of flavor and satisfaction. 
  Additionally, we sampled the Oreo Shake, which was truly remarkable, and the Mac and cheese nom noms, which, although not necessarily my personal preference due to my predilection for artisanal varieties, still managed to satisfy my craving for a rich and creamy pasta dish. 
  Lastly, the service we received was quite satisfactory, despite a brief delay in the arrival of our meals; however, this did not detract from our overall enjoyment of the dining experience, as we were not particularly pressed for time.

I have been subjected to a series of unfortunate events, culminating in the acquisition of my third vehicle within the past year. Despite this seemingly tumultuous period, my inclination towards brand loyalty remains steadfast, prompting me to return to the Infiniti dealership for yet another purchase. However, prior to doing so, I decided to venture onto the Lexus lot for a cursory examination of their offerings. To my utter astonishment, I encountered an automobile of extraordinary beauty, which was complemented by the exceptional customer service proffered by Michael Fletcher, our salesperson. His genuine demeanor and sincere dedication to ensuring a seamless purchasing experience left me feeling both grateful and impressed. Consequently, I am resolute in my decision to remain faithful to this particular brand and sales representative, thus rendering any future car-buying endeavors as effortless and stress-free as possible.

We were indulging in a sojourn to Las Vegas, hailing from the Golden State of California, when we encountered an establishment purporting to serve delectable sandwiches, specifically Jimmy John's. Our initial exposure to this culinary delight transpired in Minnesota, whereupon we became instantaneously enamored with its gastronomical offerings. This particular venue, nestled within a contemporary shopping plaza adjacent to the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, presented itself in a rather unremarkable manner, yet our expectations remained optimistic. Upon partaking in their edible wares, specifically the Number Four turkey sub, accompanied by a piquant assortment of peppers, our palates were treated to an unforgettable experience. The bread, boasting an unparalleled freshness, complemented the dish flawlessly, while their chips, notably the jalapeÃ±o variety, proved to be an absolute delight. It is our ardent desire that such an esteemed eatery consider expanding its operations to the West Coast, specifically California, thereby affording us the convenience of savoring their mouthwatering creations without the necessity of traversing considerable distances.

"Prior to embarking upon an excursion to Dog Beach with my trio of canine companions, I endeavored to communicate with Leah in order to engage in preparatory activities. Following a pair of private instructional sessions focused on practical skills, we devised a comprehensive strategy that accommodated both our schedules with ease, thanks to Leah's extraordinary adaptability. The training process itself was an enjoyable experience, enhanced by Leah's humor and her proficiency in providing explicit guidance, thereby ensuring that I was cognizant of my responsibilities. Additionally, she offered valuable insights into canine behavior and psychology, allowing me to better understand my dogs' thoughts and actions. Notably, I did not sense any disapproval from Leah regarding my emotional attachment to my dogs, which I consider to be my children; this was a significant source of comfort, as I had previously been concerned about potential criticism. Subsequent to our initial lessons, I have participated in various meet and greet events and workshops, and I have even enrolled in an eight-week course. My dogs' development has been nothing short of remarkable, and I am utterly delighted to have discovered Dog House Training!!"

"Wow, I am thoroughly impressed with this establishment! It's proximity to my domicile, a mere stone's throw away, certainly doesn't detract from its appeal. This cozy waxing studio, nestled within a larger salon, boasts an unpretentious ambiance that immediately put me at ease. My encounters with Shaina, the proprietor and primary practitioner, were nothing short of delightful. She exhibited a genuine interest in understanding my preferences and tailored her services accordingly. Her deft touch and expertise made the waxing process, though momentarily uncomfortable, surprisingly expedient. In fact, the entire procedure lasted a mere 10 minutes, leaving me feeling satisfied yet curiously unscathed. I shall unquestionably return to this haven for future grooming needs."

When consuming the gastronomical delights of an unfamiliar culinary tradition, I make a concerted effort to remain silent and allow the indigenous populace to enlighten me on the proper methodology of consumption - which condiments to employ, the mechanical aspects of ingestion, and the optimal temperature and taste profiles. Well, the culinary artisans at Paradise Valley Burger Company are native to the realm of Burgerdom, and as transient visitors, it behoves us to heed their counsel regarding the optimal manner of devouring their delectable burgers. These gastronomic sorcerers have captured my imagination with their tantalizing flavorful creations. I urge you to inquire about the weekly special, as it promises to be an unforgettable epicurean adventure. On one occasion, the weekly special consisted of two diminutive patties, enrobed in a crispy batter, adorned with bacon, positioned atop a bed of collard greens infused with garlic, all crowned with a maple-bacon-sriracha aioli, served atop a crispy waffle foundation. WAFFLES! Good heavens! The mere recollection of that transcendent culinary experience evokes profound emotions, rendering me utterly speechless. My only lamentation pertains to the excessive saltiness of their seasoned fries, a minor drawback that does not detract from the overall excellence of this gastronomical paradise.

I thoroughly relish this establishment, as it is situated in close proximity to my significant other's domicile, thereby making it a convenient and preferable dining destination for us. The culinary offerings, particularly the chicken tikka masala, are of exceptional quality, and the goat curry is equally impressive. The hospitality of the servers is commendable, as they exhibit a profound dedication to ensuring that patrons feel welcome and well-cared for. It is unquestionably worthwhile to partake in the gastronomical delights offered by this restaurant.

 Update: The midday repast buffet available at this eatery has been displaying a marked improvement on a daily basis, much to the delight of patrons who seek a delectable and satisfying dining experience.

We have never experienced a subpar dining experience at this establishment. The chicken pita boasts an unparalleled level of culinary excellence within the local region, while my spouse holds the gyro pita and accompanying Greek fries in high esteem; meanwhile, my personal preference gravitates towards the Greek salad as an accompaniment to the delectable pita offerings. Notwithstanding the aforementioned pita options, the chicken shawarma meal, augmented by pita chips and rice, piques my interest due to its unwavering capacity to satiate my gastronomical desires. The enigmatic formula behind the preparation of the rice remains a mystery, albeit one that I yearn to unravel on a daily basis. For those who have yet to partake in the epicurean delights offered by this restaurant, they are indeed missing out on a gustatory experience that is nothing short of extraordinary.

I was utterly enamored with my experience here! As a recent transplant to the southwest side, having relocated from the verdant enclave of Green Valley, I had been ardently seeking a salon that could cater to my fastidious tastes; thus, I decided to venture forth and sample the wares of "Polished," a establishment purported to be quite renowned, albeit my expectations were unfortunately not met, for despite their extensive palette of colors, the customer service was deplorable and the prices exorbitant. In fact, upon arriving seven minutes subsequent to our appointed time, I discovered that our reservation had been callously surrendered, eliciting my utmost incredulity and ire; furthermore, the receptionists' discourteous demeanor only served to exacerbate my already heightened sense of indignation, prompting me to entertain the notion of administering a vigorous slapping to the impertinent blonde, whose haughty countenance seemed to embody the very essence of superciliousness. Disillusioned and disheartened, I turned to my trusty Google device, seeking solace in the realm of cyberspace, whereupon I chanced upon "Excellent Nails," a hitherto unexplored oasis that promised to quell my discontent; and indeed, upon entering its welcoming confines, I was immediately struck by the salon's convivial ambiance and the courteous demeanor of its staff, who greeted me with warm smiles and an absence of the overbearing crowding that so often accompanies popular establishments. Suffice it to say, I was thoroughly enchanted by Lisa's fastidious attention to detail and her unwavering commitment to excellence, ensuring that my visit was an unmitigated success; henceforth, I shall unhesitatingly designate "Excellent Nails" as my preferred sanctum of beauty, whereupon I shall revel in the unparalleled expertise of its artisans, secure in the knowledge that my pampering needs shall be met with consummate skill and an unyielding dedication to the finest quality.

"As an ardent devotee of Madonna's culinary creations, I must confess that the absence of her delectable Conquistador salads continues to leave a palpable void in my gastronomic experiences. However, my recent visit to her newly established eatery has effectively assuaged my longstanding craving for flavorsome sustenance. Upon entering the venue, I was warmly received by Mario, who graciously guided me through the extensive menu, elaborating on the various dishes and their ingredients. As a novice to Middle Eastern cuisine, I greatly appreciated his patient explanations and the detailed descriptions provided on the menu and labels. This enabled me to make informed choices and savor each dish's unique flavors without any trepidation. Thus far, I have had the pleasure of partaking in three distinct entrees: the kofta, a delectable blend of two meats accompanied by shish kabobs and schwarma, and lastly, the schwarma entree solo. Each dish has surpassed my expectations, with the schwarma emerging as my unrivaled favorite, complemented by the indispensable garlic sauce. Furthermore, I have developed a penchant for the tabouli and roasted potatoes as side dishes, and the baklava has proven to be the quintessential conclusion to a satisfying meal. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend giving this restaurant a try, as the copious portions and reasonable prices make for an exceptional dining experience."

"Utterly captivating. An establishment I frequent when seeking to reassure myself that refined and hospitable environments still exist. Extremely fond of the opulent shared areas - specifically, the lobby and Terrace Room. Additionally, the Tap Room exudes an inviting ambiance, characterized by warmth and comfort, reminiscent of a welcoming abode rather than a sterile hotel. The staff maintains a level of proficiency while simultaneously radiating warmth, making me feel as though I am visiting a cherished acquaintance rather than a generic lodging establishment. I thoroughly adore it - and consider myself fortunate to be able to experience the William Penn's charms on a regular basis."

"Beneficial, expeditious, and economical. The dubious rental car corporation situated across the thoroughfare (ACE rental car) unjustly deprived me of my booking. In the absence of a reservation, I efficiently accomplished my objectives at the Hertz agency, securing a superior vehicle for a comparable fee within a brief span of 15 minutes."

"Gastronomical excellence abounds at this esteemed eatery, as evidenced by the delectable turkey wrap, a culinary masterpiece that has secured a profound fondness in my gastric sensibilities. Indeed, such is the quality of the fare that I have become thoroughly enamored with the establishment, frequenting it with an unwavering dedication that belies my unrelenting craving for its gustatory delights."

"We thoroughly enjoyed our experience at this establishment, as evidenced by our enthusiastic patronage of the bar area, where we opted to situate ourselves. My companion and I both partook in an assortment of delectable victuals, including the Pinot and antipasto platter, which regrettably proved to be too voluminous for me to consume in its entirety, despite my best efforts. The soft cheese, peppered meat, and roasted pears harmonized beautifully with the wine, creating a symphony of flavors that left us both incredibly satiated. Subsequently, I indulged in a pair of potent potables, specifically a blueberry muddled drink and a gin muddled concoction infused with basil and black pepper, both of which elicited an unbridled sense of delight from yours truly. Meanwhile, my associate savored the Caesar salad and Kobe meatballs, accompanied by a duo of delectable drinks, namely the dragonfruit daiquiri and a whiskey-based beverage, all of which were devoured with relish and pronounced 'excellent' by said individual. Throughout our prolonged stay, we were the recipients of numerous friendly and engaging interactions with the servers and manager, who displayed an unwavering commitment to ensuring our comfort and satisfaction."

Absolutely incredible!  Not only does Garrett do great work, but his pricing is incredible too.  Never looked forward to getting my carpets done in the past, but now I have him on auto schedule lol.  Thanks so much for doing such a great job every time!  Oh and don't forget they do car upholstery and tile too!

"I have had the privilege of visiting a plethora of vape shops in my quest for the ideal establishment, and I must say that this particular shop stands out among its peers as my unequivocal favorite. Not only does it boast an extensive array of products, but the quality and variety of its offerings are truly exceptional. Furthermore, the customer service experience has been nothing short of exemplary, with the staff exhibiting a remarkable level of cordiality and friendliness that has left me feeling valued and satisfied. I would highly recommend this vape shop to anyone seeking a top-notch vaping experience."

This eatery, without a doubt, boasts the most exceptional Gluten-Free Pizza (GFP) in town, owing to its delectable flavor profile and satisfying crunch; furthermore, the welcoming ambiance and tasteful embellishments of the interior space create an inviting atmosphere that complements the culinary experience, making it nearly impossible for patrons to resist the temptation of indulging in a second helping or even a third, such is the extent of their satisfaction with the fare provided.

Aloha is my favor fro yo spot. The staff is always friendly and gives you little sample cups upon entering. its always very clean and they change their flavors frequently. They have couches and games to play while you eat your yogurt. Really cute place!

I am assigning a rating of 5 to this concert, not solely based on my admiration for Celine Dion's music, but rather due to the comprehensive nature of the experience that I had the pleasure of indulging in. As fate would have it, my companions and I were situated in Orch3 row M, which offered us an optimal auditory experience, as we were able to thoroughly relish in the potency of Celine's vocal prowess without any diminution in quality, akin to being present at a venue such as HP Pavilion. My enthusiasm for the performance was further amplified by the involvement of Dragone, whose choreographic expertise undoubtedly elevated my assessment from a 4 to a 5. During moments when my attention was diverted from Celine, I was captivated by the dynamic dancers and the visually stunning tableaux that were unfolding onstage, which proved to be a source of fascination for me. My sibling, who was seated adjacent to me, was profoundly moved by the performance, evidenced by her tearful state throughout the majority of the show; however, I was somewhat less familiar with Celine's repertoire, yet I still derived enjoyment from hearing her render her signature songs live, while simultaneously appreciating the diversified elements of the production that kept me engaged. It is undeniable that Celine has maintained her physical appearance remarkably well over the years, which served as a testament to her enduring appeal. Although I would not attend another one of her concerts, I am content with having had the opportunity to partake in this singular experience. Moreover, the venue's staff efficiently facilitated the retrieval of our confiscated cameras post-show, thereby avoiding any potential chaos or inconvenience. For devotees of Celine Dion, I would unhesitatingly recommend attending this concert, as it marks her final year of performances.

We entered the establishment this evening in the company of our spouse and were immediately struck by the vast number of patrons present, which necessitated a brief waiting period of approximately five minutes before we were accommodated with a table. Upon being seated, we were promptly provided with beverages, and our server, who exhibited exceptional proficiency in her duties, apologized for an anticipated delay in the preparation of our meals due to an unexpected surge in demand, which, in turn, led to a slight delay in the fulfillment of our culinary desires. Notwithstanding this minor setback, our order was ultimately served within a ten-minute time frame, and our server, persistently attentive and considerate, replenished our beverages on multiple occasions, ensuring that our needs were consistently met. The pho, a traditional Vietnamese noodle soup and the primary focus of our dining experience, was of considerable quality and quantity, such that it readily ascended to a position among our preferred Vietnamese culinary establishments, a distinction well-deserved and eminently warranted.

"Indulge in the contemporary ambiance while savoring a refreshing beverage and a delectable pie, capitalizing on an online promotional offer to explore a novel culinary establishment within close proximity to my abode. My companion and I initiated our gastronomic excursion by sampling the toasted ravioli complemented by a tangy marinara dipping sauce, relishing each chewy morsel of the dough-enveloped filling. Subsequently, we opted to sample the quintessential New York-style pizza, characterized by a satisfying crunch and generously portioned toppings. Our server exhibited exceptional hospitality, guaranteeing that our beverages remained replenished and expressing enthusiasm regarding the palatability of the fare. Without a doubt, I shall return to this eatery in the near future."

"Lifetime Fitness offers an abundance of amenities that extend far beyond the conventional parameters of a traditional gymnasium, eliciting envy from my siblings when they visit from New Jersey; they liken it to a luxurious country club. I became a member in 2005 during my second pregnancy and have since enjoyed an uninterrupted tenure as a satisfied patron. My children, now aged six and ten, have outgrown the Children's Center, but I cannot help but feel grateful for the respite it provided me during their formative years, affording me a few cherished moments of tranquility several times a week. Kudos to Lifetime Fitness for providing a superlative facility."

Julian's proficiency and fervor regarding mixology are undeniably conspicuous for aficionados of artisanal potations seeking an unforgettable experience at Vesper, as his expertise and dedication to his craftsmanship are certain to leave a lasting impression on those who partake in the establishment's offerings.

Great quality for great value.

This is one of my favourite brunch places, it's super cute and is steps away from the Atwater Market and Lachine Canal. It's ideal for those summer days when you'd like to take a little stroll or bike ride after. It's usually busy and tends to have a line up during typical brunch hours, so the earlier (or later) you get in.. the better! 

I'm a big fan of their omelettes (the one's served in the cast iron skillet, too) and their benedicts! Their menu offers up so many varieties, all of which are delicious! Their potatoes are made to perfection... perfectly spiced, perfectly crispy on the outside, and perfectly soft on the inside! 

Whether you like it salty or sweet... you will not be disappointed.

"It is imperative that we establish a presence in New York, and ideally, a location proximal to the strip would be optimal. Although I did not object to venturing beyond our usual haunt to experience the culinary delights offered by this establishment, it was undoubtedly worth the excursion. I lamented the fact that a greater number of individuals did not accompany us, thereby precluding us from indulging in a broader array of gastronomical offerings; however, there is always the prospect of a future visit. 

We initiated our gustatory exploration with the duck baos, which were succulent, tender, and brimming with flavor. An order of truffle fries accompanied by a piquant dipping sauce was also shared among us. In terms of burgers, my selection was the Kalbi burger, while my fiancÃ© opted for the Kiki, and my future brother-in-law chose the Shogun. My assessment was that the Kalbi burger was the most exceptional of the trio. Although the Kiki burger was palatable, it was slightly too saccharine for my taste. 

In conclusion, we shall unquestionably return to this eatery, and our anticipation for the oxtail friese is already palpable. Until next year!"

"I required a light bulb replacement for my Z4, which I had been neglecting for approximately two months due to my reluctance to incur an exorbitant expense at the authorized BMW dealership. However, upon recollecting the presence of a nearby independent repair shop, German Motor Works, located conveniently behind the Chevron Car Wash, I decided to contact them for assistance. Following a brief telephone conversation with Andrew, I was assured that my comparatively minor issue would receive the same level of attention and care as a more extensive engine renovation. His relaxed demeanor and commitment to providing a hassle-free experience at a reasonable cost instilled confidence in me, leading me to entrust my cherished Z4 to his capable hands. Furthermore, while my vehicle was being serviced, I inquired about the price of an impending Inspection 2, which was quoted at a remarkably affordable rate, prompting me to schedule the procedure simultaneously. I would unhesitatingly recommend Andrew and German Motor Works to any BMW proprietor seeking exceptional service and meticulous attention to detail."
Great find!!! Little place that you could easily pass and not see it. Don't miss this place though cause really great food.

I must confess that I am not habitually inclined to compose reviews on Yelp, however, given my profound affection for Aquaknox and the frequency with which my family and I have indulged in their exquisite culinary offerings over the past decade, I feel compelled to express my sentiments. As ardent devotees of haute cuisine along the Las Vegas strip, we have had the privilege of sampling an array of esteemed establishments, including Joel Robuchon, Picasso, Le Cirque, N9NE steakhouse, and Eiffel Tower, among others. Nonetheless, Aquaknox has consistently demonstrated a level of gastronomic excellence and exceptional service that is unrivaled. Their commitment to providing an unparalleled dining experience has been a constant source of delight and satisfaction for us.

The appointment of Min as their new manager has further elevated the already impressive standards of hospitality at Aquaknox. We were particularly impressed by Min's extraordinary efforts to accommodate our request for a pina colada, despite its absence from the menu. Undeterred by the lack of a blender, he personally ventured to adjacent restaurants in search of the necessary equipment, ensuring that our desire for this refreshing beverage was fulfilled. Such dedication to customer satisfaction is truly remarkable and testifies to the exceptional caliber of the staff at Aquaknox.

We have been steadfast in our allegiance to Aquaknox as our preferred seafood haven and go-to destination for special occasions. Our unwavering loyalty stems from the consistent delivery of delectable dishes that never fail to captivate our taste buds. Some of our most enthusiastically endorsed options include the flavorful steamed mussels, best savored with an additional serving of bread; the sublime lobster cocktail, complemented by a zesty citrus garlic aioli; the sweet shrimp and lump crab salad, a symphony of freshness and texture; the rich lobster bisque, whose heavenly aroma permeates the atmosphere; the tender filet mignon and surf n turf, a masterful fusion of land and sea; the Pacific prawns on couscous, enriched by a luxurious lobster cream sauce; and the red snapper, poised atop a bed of truffle potato puree, an inspired combination that showcases the culinary prowess of Aquaknox's skilled chefs.

In conclusion, if you seek a superior seafood experience coupled with exceptional service, look no further than Aquaknox. Their ability to consistently deliver an unforgettable dining encounter is unmatched, making them an indispensable gem in the realm of gastronomy.

The Spa at Camelback Inn is one of my favorite places in Arizona. The resort is beautiful and the spa is amazing. The grounds of the spa are gorgeous and tranquil. The Swedish massage is the best I have ever had. Even the shampoo and hand soap smell delicious - I had to buy them for myself. A day here takes away all my worries. I am addicted!

After being apprised of this establishment by acquaintances and fellow patrons of the online review platform, I deemed it imperative to experience it firsthand. The Oyster Bar is nestled within the Palace Station casino and has a limited seating capacity of merely 18 individuals. There were approximately six individuals awaiting their turn ahead of us at around 3 am, and we were eventually seated following a brief wait of slightly over an hour. The culinary experts manning the kitchen were quite cordial and worked diligently, albeit at a pace that resulted in a delay of approximately 20-30 minutes prior to the presentation of our repast. My personal preference was for a half dozen oysters, priced at $10 between the hours of 1-9 am, in addition to the Combo Pan Roast, which garnered considerable acclaim and carried a price tag of $23.99.

The oysters were expertly shucked and ranked among the most delectable specimens I have had the pleasure of consuming. As I have not sampled the dish previously, I cannot offer a valid comparison; however, I can describe the Combo Pan Roast as a hearty, brandy-infused stew composed of tomato and cream, replete with copious portions of crab, lobster, and shrimp. The flavor profile was spot-on, registering at a satisfying level 8 on the spiciness meter, while the texture was luxuriously rich and creamy. The portion size was generous, providing ample leftovers for me to savor later. I shall unquestionably return to this eatery during my next visit to Las Vegas.
The sandwiches are like no other and the wings are great and even can be ordered grilled. The beer selection is absurd.

"I unequivocally adore this route! It constitutes an optimal location for engaging in physical activities such as cycling, walking, or running, sans the perils of vehicular traffic, while offering picturesque views that are nothing short of breathtaking! As a concierge for an upscale resort in North Scottsdale, I am privileged to interact with and proffer recommendations to patrons on a daily basis. For those who are inclined towards physical exertion during the summer season, I strongly advise against allowing the sweltering heat to deter them from partaking in outdoor pursuits; rather, I suggest they capitalize on the verdant expanse of the green belt trail, a magnificent path that extends for approximately 41 miles. It is imperative to remember to bring copious amounts of hydrating beverages, given the length and intensity of the excursion. Furthermore, patrons will encounter an abundance of establishments serving delectable cuisine and refreshing libations along this particular stretch, providing ample opportunities to indulge in some well-deserved respite."

"If you possess a predilection for culinary offerings with a piquant flavor profile, you may find their camarones al diablo to be particularly appealing. The portion sizes are quite generous, allowing you to create two substantial burritos from a single meal. The quality of the dish is such that it warrants frequent visits, which I have found to be the case in my personal experience."

"Expressing profound disappointment and frustration, I uttered an audible growl, 'Grrr,' in response to the absence of my preferred green tea yogurt at the establishment, prompting the friendly female staff member stationed at the counter to offer an explanation for its unavailability at this particular location, specifying that the highly sought-after macha green tea variety could only be obtained during my visits to Los Angeles, where it is currently available, and temporarily substituting Jamba Juice as a consolation prize, albeit with a hint of melancholy, I opted to momentarily endure the deficiency."

"I pursued Jillian to this salon due to her exceptional proficiency, despite the arduous journey from the West Valley. This establishment exudes an effervescent, lively ambiance and a genial, welcoming atmosphere. \n\nJillian possesses the uncommon gift of not only attentive listening and comprehending the precise requirements of one's hair, but also the skill to actualize that vision with her deft, polished touch. She achieves the desired outcome with her diplomatic and self-assured approach. Whenever I receive accolades for my coiffure, I am delighted to endorse Jillian; her expertise has prompted numerous individuals, including my spouse, to switch to her services permanently. Moreover, it is an added benefit to display the new hairstyle at one of the stylish eateries in the Roosevelt area subsequent to the salon visit."

When you enter the venue, you are immediately greeted by a canine clad in attire reminiscent of a hotel bellhop, which elicits a humorous response. The production that follows is nothing short of extraordinary, featuring an array of captivating acts that showcase the remarkable talents of various animals, including a charismatic lagomorph with the ability to engage in conversation, felines capable of executing daring acrobatic feats, and a group of canines demonstrating their proficiency in various activities. Furthermore, the presentation features an endearing Russian family performing traditional circus routines with a vintage flair. Notably, all of the animals participating in the show have been rescued from unfortunate circumstances, adding a commendable element to the production. Additionally, the ticket prices for this Vegas show are surprisingly reasonable, making it an excellent value for the entertainment provided. Finally, it is worth mentioning that anyone who fails to appreciate the show likely has a diminished capacity for enjoying enjoyable experiences.

They offer bento boxes for convenient, on-the-go consumption, featuring an array of options such as fish, poultry, and combination meals. The prices for these delectable, pre-packaged meals are quite reasonable, with small bento boxes available for around $4 and larger portions priced at approximately $6. Despite the affordability, the quality of the cuisine remains impressively high.

"Gastronomical delight in the form of a chicken burrito, albeit sans the customary warm welcome accorded to other patrons, the gentleman manning the counter at approximately 7:30 pm did eventually proffer me a taste of one meat and a dollop of jalapeno cream cheese, the latter being part of an assortment of fiery condiments available at the salsa bar, including a surprisingly piquant green variety, typically considered mild, and a pico de Gallo for those who prefer their culinary experiences less incendiary; the beef immersed in crimson sauce boasted a potent punch, while the chicken, comprising substantial portions of succulent white meat, underwent a brief grilling respite prior to being incorporated into my made-to-order burrito, a gastronomic masterpiece in the making. 
 Characteristic features of this establishment include: 
 1. A choice of five distinct tortillas, including chipotle 
 2. Roasted corn kernels as an optional burrito filling 
 3. Freshly prepared horchata 
 4. Complimentary house-made chips accompanying each order 
 The skilled manipulation of ingredients by the culinary artisan responsible for constructing my burrito elevated it to an exceptional level, eclipsing many chain restaurants and rendering it my preferred rapid Mexican dining spot, with a total cost of $8.18 for the meal and beverage, a veritable bargain. Kudos to preceding Yelp reviewers for unearthing this hidden treasure."

"My culinary excursions frequently lead me to the Hurricane, whereupon I partake in their delectable Jamaican Jerk wings. Initially, the flavor profile struck me as somewhat unconventional, boasting a saccharine jerk sauce with a subtle yet palpable piquancy that stopped short of being overwhelmingly fiery. However, as I progressively indulged in more of these succulent morsels, my taste buds began to acclimate themselves to the singular essence, ultimately leading to an enhanced gustatory experience. The chicken wings themselves possess an impressive meatiness, and the five-piece serving size constitutes an ideal portion for a satisfying midday repast. Moreover, the establishment offers Pabst Blue Ribbon at a consistently affordable price point, rendering it an accessible accompaniment to my epicurean indulgences."

"I was impelled to confer a perfect quintet of stellar ratings upon this culinary establishment, as a rejoinder to the plethora of frivolous and unjustified criticisms proffered by an array of misguided'reviewers'. The dearth of shrimp burritos and the absence of table service, rather than detracting from the eatery's excellence, serve only to highlight its specialization in the art of crafting delectable, freshly prepared burritos. As such, it is an optimal venue for a satisfying midday repast, and I implore reviewers to exercise cognitive faculties when sharing their opinions on this platform."

I came here because of the great reviews. I can honestly tell you that the staff here are attentive and care. The first time I came here I waited only 10 minutes. Office staff are polite and treat you like a family member. The doctor was attentive and listened to what I had to say. I was iffy about coming, since I dont like medical offices. I enjoyed my visit here. I felt comfortable with the staff.

"A diminutive yet captivating museum, nestled within the picturesque confines of downtown Scottsdale, offers visitors an intimate and gratuituous cultural experience. The welcoming and erudite staff, possessing an unwavering dedication to their vocation, enthusiastically engage with patrons, fostering an atmosphere conducive to lively discourse and unhurried exploration. It is highly recommended that visitors allocate sufficient time to immerse themselves in the richness of this unique institution, as a cursory visit would prove insufficient to appreciate the diverse array of exhibits and the fervent passion of the docents."

"My newly discovered venue for Happy Hour libations! Particularly economical for my beloved Midori Sour!! \n\nI opted for the Tuna Tartare, Pork and Beef Sliders, Jambalaya, and the Ribeye cooked to a medium temperature. Exceptionally delectable and fresh! Notwithstanding the fact that it was only Happy Hour, we were graciously led to a stylish table adorned with curtains, providing an air of seclusion and intimacyâa remarkable feature, especially considering the time of day! Our attentive bartender/server, who bore a striking resemblance to a taller, clean-shaven iteration of Iron Man, offered impeccable service; furthermore, the chef personally delivered our primary dishes and expressed his skepticism regarding my ability to consume the steak, wishing me good fortune in the endeavor... Nevertheless, I successfully devoured it! Ultimately, the barstaurant presented a sophisticated and refined dining experience at a reasonable cost."
Quick friendly service.  These guys actually want you to get the cheapest price with the best coverage.  Imagine that, from an insurance person?

Just stumbled upon this place right near my apartment and went here for breakfast two days in a row.  Best breakfast place in scottsdale hands down and not overly crowded unlike other ones on scottsdale rd.  chimichurro sauce and the quality of bread for the toast made this,place stand out.

This eatery boasts an unparalleled ambiance, with a menu that offers an innovative fusion of traditional Japanese culinary elements and Spanish tapas-style dishes, creating a truly singular epicurean experience for patrons. The restaurant's commitment to utilizing only the freshest ingredients is evident in their selection of delectable dishes, which include, but are not limited to, succulent bacon-wrapped asparagus, savory beef tongue skewers (which are sure to surpass your expectations), pork-wrapped gobo, and expertly prepared tempura asparagus. Furthermore, the establishment's beverage offerings feature an array of premium sake bombs, carefully crafted to complement the diverse flavors of the menu. Perhaps most remarkable, however, is the exceptional value offered by this dining destination, providing customers with an unforgettable culinary adventure at a price point that is both reasonable and accessible.

"Excessively gratifying! Dr. Joshua allocates copious amounts of time meticulously elucidating intricate details to his patients, possessing profound expertise. This establishment does not conform to the conventional two-minute hasty chiropractic adjustment; instead, they prioritize thorough patient care. The pre and post-therapeutic cryotherapy treatments are an additional innovative feature that enhances the overall experience, fostering immense satisfaction."

"An exceptional eatery that offers a salubrious culinary experience, with a team of hospitable and erudite staff who are proficient in their field, serving an array of delectable and nourishing dishes, along with expertly crafted smoothies that cater to the health-conscious individual's palate, all carefully curated by nutritional aficionados to provide an optimal post-workout dining destination."

"I entered this establishment seeking a precise nail classification. Additionally, I opted for a pedicure. Peter executed an impeccable task in shaping and polishing my stiletto nails, rendering them utterly breathtaking. I would unhesitatingly recommend this salon to my fellow females visiting Las Vegas, given that I am merely transiting through. Upon my next visit to this city, I shall certainly revisit this venue. My sincere appreciation extends to Peter for his exceptional work."

"Oh my goodness! Absolutely phenomenal donuts! They meticulously craft each donut to order, allowing you to select your preferred toppings and savor the delectable treat while it's still sizzling hot. My taste buds were delightfully indulged by the heavenly combination of rich caramel and crispy toasted coconut. It was truly a gastronomical masterpiece! Moreover, they offer an assortment of expertly brewed beverages, including freshly roasted coffee beans delivered on a weekly basis, robust espresso, and refreshingly flavorful iced tea carefully prepared using high-quality tea leaves. I am positively enthused about becoming a regular patron of this exceptional establishment, as the mere thought of their scrumptious donuts has me yearning for another taste sensation even before I've barely finished enjoying the first."

"Love Lish Nails, truly an exceptional establishment! The proprietors, Levi and Thao, alongside their diligent staff, perpetuate a welcoming ambiance, ensuring a pleasurable experience for patrons, my mother and I included. We frequent this salon biweekly, as the meticulous attention to hygiene, utilizing unused tools and liners for each client, respectively, instills utmost confidence. Additionally, the owners' considerate gestures, such as offering a complimentary ice cream voucher from Baskin Robbins during a brief wait, demonstrate their commitment to customer satisfaction."

"Each time I find myself in the city of Pittsburgh, I encounter considerable difficulty in resisting the allure of Espresso a Mano, as my predilection for distinctive coffee varieties compels me to indulge in their specialty pour-over cup, regardless of any extraneous factors. My infatuation with this establishment has led me to sample their diverse selection of single-source Sidamo beans from Ethiopia on multiple occasions, and I must say that the experience has been nothing short of delightful. Moreover, the coffee shop boasts a spacious seating area, complemented by complimentary WiFi access, thereby creating an ideal setting for patrons to socialize or engage in productive endeavors. During favorable weather conditions, the proprietors thoughtfully open the garage door, transforming the interior space into an inviting outdoor environment. Thus, I wholeheartedly recommend visiting this establishment to support the advancement of high-quality coffee culture."

"An extensive array of artisanal brews, constantly evolving to incorporate novel and exotic offerings, rivals the plethora of craft beer establishments in Pittsburgh, while the restaurant's diverse hamburger selection boasts imaginative variations on traditional dinner fare, complemented by an assortment of delectable sandwiches and salads. Additionally, an ample wine list, featuring selections that cater to a wide range of tastes and preferences without breaking the bank, and innovative cocktails crafted with precision and flair, round out the menu, rendering this eatery an excellent choice for discerning patrons seeking a culinary experience that transcends the mundane."

I have been a loyal patron of this establishment since its inception, with an unwavering commitment spanning over four years, and I must say that my experiences have been nothing short of exceptional. Throughout my numerous visits, I have consistently demonstrated respect and courtesy towards the staff, and in return, I have received top-notch service, irrespective of whether I arrived promptly or later than anticipated. It is worth noting that I have also referred several acquaintances to this salon, all of whom have expressed unequivocal satisfaction and contentment with the services rendered. It is quite evident that the rare dissatisfaction expressed by a select few individuals is anomalous, and it is reasonable to surmise that there must be a compelling factor behind Emporium's ability to maintain a thriving business despite the economic challenges faced by similar establishments. I would venture to say that the proprietor, Toby, and his team, are truly a class act, and their dedication to providing excellent service has not gone unnoticed. It is worth mentioning that if one is seeking a salon that offers subpar services, then Emporium may not be the optimal choice. However, if you value honesty and quality work, then this establishment is certainly worthy of consideration.

I actually discovered Copperline plumbing (Gabe) via Yelp and I am truly grateful for the serendipitous encounter. While I was away on business, my spouse contacted me and informed me that the kitchen floor was unusually warm. Considering the absence of floor warmers, we deduced that there must be an anomaly. Following this realization, we promptly shut off the hot water and conducted a search on Yelp, ultimately leading us to Copperline and Gabe's expert services. Upon contacting him, he advised us to enlist the assistance of a leak detection specialist to pinpoint the source of the water leak, after which he would arrive on the scene to provide an estimate and initiate repairs.

Unfortunately, the leak detection company did not excel in their endeavors to locate the leak, thereby presenting Gabe with an additional challenge. Nevertheless, he demonstrated remarkable proficiency in deciphering the issue and executed a superb job in repairing the damage. In addition, I opted to replace my water heater simultaneously, and Gabe efficiently handled the task while concurrently disposing of the old unit. It is evident that Gabe is an unrelenting artisan who leaves no stone unturned in his quest to achieve impeccable results on the initial attempt. His customer service acumen is equally impressive, as he exudes patience, comprehension, and an unwavering commitment to client satisfaction.

The project entailed more than just routine maintenance, as it necessitated rerouting the primary water line, a feat that proved challenging due to the age of my residence. Undeterred, Gabe undertook the task with unwavering dedication, even venturing into the attic's confined spaces and surgically cutting through certain walls. His unwavering commitment to ensuring a flawless execution was nothing short of admirable. My household is eternally grateful for Gabe's expertise, and we will unhesitatingly seek his services for any future plumbing requirements.

"My affection for the Rubber Duck extends beyond mere appreciation, as I find myself captivated by his charm and appeal. His presence elicits an unparalleled sense of nostalgia, transporting me back to a time when life's complexities seemed less daunting. The artist's intent to evoke the playfulness of youth has been resoundingly successful, as evidenced by the widespread fascination he has garnered. My initial encounter with this colossal rubber fowl transpired on the night of his grand entrance, amidst a flurry of festivities that enveloped downtown Pittsburgh. As we drew nearer, my exhilaration intensified, and I was struck by his majestic appearance, accentuated by the picturesque backdrop of PNC Park. It was heartening to observe a multitude of boats paying homage to this celebrated visitor. Subsequent mornings witnessed my continued infatuation, as I eagerly anticipated catching a glimpse of him en route to work. My ardor for the duck knew no bounds, prompting me to organize a family excursion to Norfolk, Virginia, where he was slated to make a subsequent appearance. The opportunity to share this beloved character with younger generations only augmented my delight. His prospective return to Pittsburgh is eagerly awaited, and I remain optimistic that our paths will cross once again."

I found my new favorite liquor store. I've been wanting to come here for a while, but I just never mad it out there. Well, I wanted a keg for my Super Bowl party and I gave this place a call. They not only had the cheapest keg around, but they also had the cheapest deposit too.\n\nThis will probably be the only place I go from now on when I'm hunting for a unique beer AND when I hit the bars. Oh yeah... there is a bar in the basement. Cool, huh?

"The mere act of traversing in the proximity of this culinary establishment precipitates an uncontrollable salivation response within my oral cavity! I am uncertain whether the atmospheric surroundings of Pig & Pickle genuinely exude an aroma reminiscent of cured pork or if my imagination is merely playing tricks on my olfactory senses. 

The hospitality we received was both cordial and expeditious. I opted for the porchetta, which was utterly sublime. Each bite presented a distinctive flavor profile and texture. The internal segment boasted a subtle spicy quality, while the external portion was tantamount to the essence of bacon, yet somehow superior. Additionally, I sampled the pork tacos accompanied by kimchi, and they were exceptional! Tender shreds of swine complemented by a kimchi topping that refrained from overpowering the dish. 

Furthermore, the dessert we partook of was nothing short of revolutionary. The nutella ice cream was a gastronomical masterpiece that transcended my expectations. Typically, I forgo the indulgence of dessert due to my propensity to overindulge during the primary course, however, my dining companion convinced me to relinquish my reservations. It was an unparalleled delight, leaving me to ruminate on the experience and contemplate the optimal time for my return visit to Pig & Pickle, whereupon I aspire to sample every item on their extensive menu."

"Indulge me, dear reader, by allowing me to share my unequivocal endorsement of the most exceptional buffet experience Las Vegas has to offer. I assiduously implore you to partake in the gastronomical splendor that is [BUFFET NAME], conveniently located at the renowned [HOTEL NAME]. By doing so, you shall liberate yourself from the arduous task of deciding which culinary extravaganza to indulge in during your forthcoming visit to the famed Strip. 

Incidentally, although the cost for breakfast may seem slightly elevated in comparison to other establishments, such as the Rio, I assure you that the value surpasses the price by a factor of ten. The vast array of delectable options available at [BUFFET NAME] is truly remarkable, catering to an extensive range of tastes and dietary preferences. From the quintessential American and Mexican breakfast staples to the more unconventional, low-carb selections, this esteemed eatery boasts an impressive diversity of flavors. Furthermore, the presence of Asian-inspired delights, including donuts reminiscent of those savored during travels in China, adds an unparalleled touch of international flair. 

The charcuterie and cheese section is nothing short of extraordinary, showcasing an assortment of phenomenal cheeses that are sure to delight even the most discerning palates. Additionally, pressed juices, miniature dishes, sugar-free and sugar-overload desserts, and ample seating options further enhance the overall experience. 

Personally, I had the pleasure of partaking in this gastronomic journey alongside my boyfriend, and we opted to visit approximately 30-45 minutes prior to the transition to the lunch menu. This strategic timing allowed us to sample both the breakfast and lunch offerings, resulting in an unforgettable culinary adventure. My sole regret? Not possessing a stomach capacious enough to accommodate every last morsel I yearned to consume. 

In conclusion, permit me to reiterate that [BUFFET NAME] stands alone as the definitive buffet experience in Las Vegas, rendering all others unnecessary. Once you've indulged in the lavish spread presented here, you'll comprehend precisely why this establishment reigns supreme among local and visiting gourmands alike."

"An exceptional morning experience unfolded at Prohibitionâformerly known as Vino Vin et Terraceâin the presence of newly installed signage, providing an ambiance that harmoniously complemented the delectable culinary offerings. My taste buds were delightfully satiated by the crispy, deep-fried pain perdu, accompanied by succulent fried chicken; meanwhile, my better half found it impossible to resist the allure of the breakfast poutine, a heavenly composition of golden fries adorned with savory cheese curds, tantalizing bacon, flavorful sausage gravy, and a fried egg, all crowned with a rich hollandaise sauce. The scrumptiousness of these dishes was enhanced by the unlimited cup of expertly brewed coffee and the attentive, hospitable service that left no detail unattended. Prohibition's diverse menu showcased inventive creations, such as fluffy stuffed ricotta pancakes, banh mi breakfast, and Bavarian benedict, setting them apart from other establishments in Montreal and solidifying their position as one of my preferred breakfast destinations in the city."

"Optimally intoxicated, we pursued sustenance at an establishment renowned for its delectable offerings, Grand Lux Cafe. Conveniently situated in close proximity to Tao, this eatery boasts extended operating hours, catering to nocturnal patrons who crave satisfying fare following an evening of indulgent libations. Our visit transpired during the wee hours, yet the venue remained bustling with activity, a testament to its enduring popularity. We relished the poultry and waffles, a culinary masterpiece that defied expectations by virtue of its generous proportions, allowing us to share it with ease and still enjoy leftovers for subsequent consumption. Furthermore, we sampled the chicken flautas, paired with a verdant sauce that elevated the dish to celestial heights of flavor. While Grand Lux Cafe may lack the refined ambiance of Cheesecake Factory, its more affordable pricing does not compromise the quality or taste of its offerings. In fact, our server's kindness and attentiveness only enhanced our dining experience. For those seeking a satisfying, albeit unhealthy, post-revelry repast, Grand Lux Cafe is an optimal choice, superior to fast food alternatives."

"I embarked upon a journey to Las Vegas, boasting an unblemished complexion and unkempt brows, yet departed the city with a radically transformed appearance, courtesy of Vanity Flair; their team, proficient in catering to the diverse needs of the fairer sex, provided me with an indulgent experience that I would unhesitatingly recommend to any female seeking a comprehensive beauty treatment. Needless to say, my subsequent visit to Sin City shall include a return to this establishment as a matter of priority."

"Commonwealth Animal Hospital boasts an exceptional veterinary team proficient in addressing diverse pet health concerns, including complex allergies that had previously resisted resolution. My Japanese Chin, afflicted with such allergies, displayed symptoms that included excessive self-mutilation, which prompted me to seek assistance from various veterinary facilities. However, it was only upon visiting Commonwealth Animal Hospital that my pet finally received effective treatment, courtesy of their skilled staff. Notably, their services extend beyond the clinic, as they offer in-home euthanasia for pets, ensuring a peaceful transition in the comfort of their familiar environment. Such compassionate care was exemplified during a friend's recent experience, where the vet and vet tech from Commonwealth Animal Hospital demonstrated empathy and support during a challenging time, earning my utmost praise and recommendation."

"I have an unwavering fondness for this pizza establishment, which stems from their exceptionally priced slice promotions and the remarkable flavor profile of their culinary offerings; furthermore, I am also inclined to order their chicken wings, which are truly sublime and contribute significantly to my overall dining satisfaction."

This establishment truly embodies an exceptional ambiance for a hotel bar, particularly one that specializes in strip entertainment. Upon visiting this venue several weeks ago, I was pleasantly surprised by the reasonable prices of their artisanal brews and the welcoming demeanor exhibited by the bartenders. The atmosphere was conducive to social interaction, boasting multiple televisions broadcasting various sporting events and a spacious setting that fostered a sense of comfort. Furthermore, the culinary offerings proved to be impressive, specifically the beer and cheese dip appetizer, which hailed from the state of Wisconsin and met my expectations as a connoisseur of fine cheeses. My companion and I were satiated by the portion size, which exceeded our expectations for a mere snack. When in the vicinity, it is worthwhile to patronize this establishment, especially considering the abundance of extravagant forms of entertainment in the surrounding area. The atmosphere exudes a down-to-earth quality that warrants high praise, and thus, I unhesitatingly endorse this restaurant. Although I typically reserve five-star ratings for exceptional experiences, this eatery surpassed my expectations among the numerous bars and clubs I have visited in Las Vegas, including other establishments that share its Irish theme.
The best pizza ever ate, crust and cheese and yum!  Delicious!  2year old says yum yum too as we eat!!

Very good food at an awesome price.  Very creative menu featuring southwestern flavors in your casual menu offerings.  The tuna nachos and mushroom quesadilla were wonderful appetizers.  The chile burger and pork sandwiches were exceptional. All in all a wonderful lunch experience.

"Upon our return on several occasions subsequent to our previous assessment (at an eatery in close proximity to our domicile), we have had the pleasure of partaking in delectable culinary offerings, while also experiencing a notable enhancement in the quality of service, specifically with regards to the attentive and accommodating nature of the waiting staff, who have demonstrated a commendable dedication to ensuring the satisfaction and well-being of their patrons, and have done so in a manner that exudes warmth and personability; furthermore, the sausage gnocchi dish continues to hold a special place in our esteem, and we wish to extend our sincerest accolades to the establishment for their consistent delivery of exceptional gastronomic experiences."

"This eatery has become a cherished destination for my spouse and me due to their delectable pizza offerings, which are crafted from scratch using authentic Italian ingredients and cooked to perfection in plain sight. Although they provide an array of culinary options, our preference is to indulge in the pizza special, featuring both pepperoni and sausage atop two substantial 18-inch slices, accompanied by a beverage of choice, all for a remarkably reasonable price of $4.99. In my estimation, this represents an unparalleled value, particularly given the high quality of the fare."

"Complimentary wireless internet access shall be bestowed upon patrons who indulge in the luxurious experience of smoking cigars, while partaking in the consumption of cold beverages, specifically beer, at a price point that is eminently reasonable and rational. Moreover, the hospitality provided by the establishment's staff, particularly the exceptional individual behind the bar, shall contribute to an atmosphere that is both welcoming and extraordinary."

Must admit that I was thoroughly impressed with this establishment. The server was hilarious, accommodating, and remarkably well-versed in the menu offerings. We initiated our culinary journey by requesting the chicken skewers, and I subsequently opted for the fiery panang curry (hot), which I must say, I thoroughly relished. My significant other selected a spicy chicken, rice, and basil dish, which was equally delectable. As per my customary practice, I requested my Thai iced tea with cream, and I must comment that the large portion size was indeed substantial. The pricing was exceptionally reasonable, the ambiance was spotless, and the staff members were incredibly cordial. I would unhesitatingly endorse this venue, and I undoubtedly foresee myself revisiting it in the proximate future.

"The experience was utterly captivating from the onset to the conclusion. We were situated on the right-hand side, specifically between the furthest right and central seats, and approximately ten rows up from the floor. The seating arrangements were comfortable, complete with integrated cup holders for our convenience. ingress and egress were effortless, allowing us to freely transport refreshments from the concourse's concession stands into the auditorium. The performers delivered an awe-inspiring display; the verdant juggling maiden, the two gentlemen rotating within circular frames, and the young woman oscillating on and off the elastic platform showcased extraordinary agility and grace. The sole observation worth mentioning is that the duo of clowns, on a few instances, appeared to be killing time and their comedic presentations lost some of their initial appeal."
Absolutely great with kids good food great prices and one amazing Italian beef sandwich!!! It's a must try when your at el mirage park!!!!

Select your base (white, wheat, or Gluten-Free), condiment, dairy or non-dairy cheese, and an abundance of fresh garnishes of your preference, all for the reasonable price of $8.95. Indeed, this ideology is quite appealing, as it does not facilitate telephonic orders, but instead encourages patrons to place their orders for takeout, thereby ensuring a more personalized and expedient experience. Furthermore, these slender crust pizzas are delectable and satisfying, making them an excellent culinary choice. Kudos to My Pie for establishing a location in close proximity to my humble abode.

My food boner went from 6 to midnight after walking in here. 

I'll never shop at another grocery store. Vons lost my business the second I took a look inside this place and shopped there for the first time.

I highly recommend shopping here if you live in the area. Highly.

"Gastronomical excellence of Mexican cuisine! Patrons afforded opportunity to sample diverse meats prior to placing order, rendering decision-making arduous due to multiplicity of delectable options. Personal preference dictated selection of three tacos for this writer, while significant other opted for a sizable wet burrito. Postprandial state of satiety ensued, yet craving persisted. Staff exhibited exceptional hospitality."

"I have an immense fondness for this diminutive sandwich boutique situated adjacent to a charming second-hand bookstore. Its culinary offerings include a diverse array of delectable breakfast and lunch selections, complemented by an assortment of refreshing Italian sodas, smoothies, and Boco beverages. 

During my recent visit, I opted for the California wrap, which encompassed an appealing medley of succulent turkey, creamy avocado, crisp sprouts, savory bacon, and rich mayo, accompanied by a fresh fruit garnish and a delectable cookie. The flavors were indeed, extremely satisfying. 

The proprietor of this establishment is remarkably affable and courteous. In addition, they provide convenient local delivery services, allowing patrons to effortlessly place orders via telephone or fax."

"Dolores G and I initially encountered this venue during our Yelp Old Town shopping excursion, whereupon we availed ourselves of a promotional offer they were featuring and reserved a time slot several weeks hence. The standard tariff for the establishment's services is $35 for a two-hour interval and $45 for a three-hour duration; we elected to indulge in the latter.

On a Thursday evening, Dolores G and I visited the premises and were presented with a diverse array of creative choices, including an interpretation of Vincent van Gogh's renowned composition featuring red poppies. It is noteworthy that the proprietors of this enterprise furnish clients with predetermined motifs and provide a stencil of the artwork on the canvas prior to the commencement of painting. I chose to pursue a divergent path and created my own interpretation of a blooming cherry blossom tree. The proprietors generously supplied all necessary materials, including paint, canvases, wine glasses, a bottle opener, musical accompaniment, and expert guidance on various artistic techniques. The experience was thoroughly enjoyable, and I returned home with a sense of pride and satisfaction, possessing a piece of art that I was eager to display prominently."

"Chilaquiles... verily, an epicurean delight that transcends the mundane and ascends to the realm of gastronomical nirvana! For the uninitiated, chilaquiles consist of pliable tortilla chips that have been subjected to a thermal process, thereby rendering them succulent and tender, and are subsequently enrobed in a flavorful amalgamation of salsa or mole and cheese, culminating in a culinary experience that is simply divine! As an ardent devotee of this delectable dish, I have had the pleasure of sampling it at numerous establishments, and I must say, Border Grill executes them to perfection. If, however, you are not partial to chilaquiles, then perhaps this critique is not relevant to your interests."

"Amorous sentiments abound, with an incremental augmentation in the magnitude of the introductory courses, vis-Ã -vis their counterparts in the City of Angels. A culinary triumvirate, comprising a medley of leafy greens, shishito peppers, and mochi ice cream, elicited unadulterated delight. However, the lobster dynamite, a dish whose nomenclature evokes explosive connotations, fell short of expectations, thereby precipitating a divergence of opinion. Notwithstanding this variance, the ambient surroundings, replete with an aura of sophistication, contributed significantly to the overall dining experience."
Fun, affordable & delicious. A bit loud for the older set but great music, free shots, and more food than you can eat. Family of 4 ate for less than $50.

This phenomenal spectacle elicited an unbridled sense of wonder and awe, evoking a profound emotional response akin to being immersed in one of Goya's most haunting and surreal nightmares - an experience that was simultaneously unsettling and captivating. Interspersed throughout the performance were brief interludes featuring awkward and uninspired salsa and disco dance routines, reminiscent of poorly choreographed scenes from a low-budget television show. Despite these momentary lapses in artistic judgment, the production as a whole remained deserving of unreserved praise, earning a well-deserved five stars.

The female performers boasted imposing physiques, their muscularity rivaling that of highly trained athletes. Absence of a certain character, Captain Winky, sparked curiosity and raised questions regarding the authenticity of some of the performers. For those planning to attend this extraordinary event, strategic seating recommendations included avoiding the front row, which was susceptible to being engulfed in a thick, eerie fog generated by dry ice, and steering clear of aisle seats adjacent to the performer stairs, as they were prone to sudden, startling interactions with demonically attired dancers. Additionally, owing to the considerable length of the rows, selecting seats near the stairs (excluding those designated for performers) was advised to minimize inconvenience in case of necessary restroom breaks.

One of my favorite spots to get delicious Montreal bagels. Prices are cheap, service is quick (mostly because it's CASH ONLY! THANK YOU!!!!!) and the bagels are fantastic. I've pretty much ate all their bagel selections at this point with my personal favorites being the Sesame and Rosemary bagels. 

NEWBIES! Make sure to request the freshest bagels, particularly if this is your first visit and you heard how awesome this place is, they WILL OBLIGE with a smile!

(-1 star) The only downside as some have mentioned previously and correctly, is this is PURELY a bagel joint. This means you can buy your cream cheese or whatnot from their freezers... but you have to construct your own bagel sandwiches elsewhere. There are indeed a few cafes nearby that may allow you to come in to setup if you purchase a coffee (a great option for those of you who like doing this) but be prepared for this as well as some places frowning on this somewhat. Lastly, the prices for things in the freezer are far more expensive than you'd get from most other places.

"Indubitably, an exceptional culinary experience was had by all, with the Parmesan crusted filet eliciting sensations akin to the richness and creaminess of butter, while the Heart of Italy combo proved to be an irresistible indulgence, further complemented by the delectable zucchini strips, thereby solidifying Chef Rod's reputation as a masterful virtuoso in the realm of gastronomical artistry."

Although they may appear somewhat inconspicuous from the exterior of the building, it is unquestionably worthwhile to venture inside the lobby of this towering structure to experience the unique ambiance of this coffee establishment. Upon entering, we opted to sample their rendition of a bulletproof beverage, which incorporated the unconventional ingredients of butter and coconut oil into a traditional americano. To our delight, the resulting flavor profile was nothing short of exceptional. Furthermore, we were presented with an opportunity to taste a complimentary sample of their signature green smoothie, which showcased a delectable blend of fresh, vibrant ingredients. The staff members at this establishment were incredibly hospitable and forthcoming with their expertise, offering us valuable recommendations for other hidden gems to explore within the city of Pittsburgh.
Still dreaming of the lobster gnocchi!!!   Delicious!   Service was excellent and we all received a complimentary glass of champaign with our dessert!  Excellent Italian food!!!

"My affinity for Del Frisco's is unwavering, as I frequent this esteemed establishment not only during Charlotte Restaurant Week, but also on momentous occasions that warrant culinary celebration. The gastronomical offerings here are indeed delectable, with each dish meticulously prepared to avoid even a hint of overcooking, ensuring an unparalleled freshness that tantalizes my taste buds.
