To our delight, the culinary offerings did not disappoint; my companion thoroughly enjoyed the Steak Frank, praising it as one of the most flavorful hot dogs he had ever had the pleasure of consuming. The aroma emanating from the dish mere moments after it was presented to us served as a testament to the quality of the ingredients used in its preparation.  

While awaiting the arrival of my milkshake, I couldn't help but notice the reasonable prices displayed on the menu. A triple burger and fries could be obtained for a mere $4, and shooters were available for a paltry sum of 89 cents each. Such prices are a veritable steal, considering the vast discrepancy in quality between Steak N Shake's offerings and those of its competitors. Furthermore, the establishment offers a Happy Hour from 2-4 pm during the week, wherein shakes are available at half price, further sweetening the already appealing deal.  

The sole drawback of this otherwise exceptional dining experience lies in the fact that the location is not open 24 hours. Considering the overwhelming popularity of the restaurant, I sincerely hope that management will reconsider this policy in the near future, as I am convinced that the demand for their delectable cuisine extends far beyond the present operating hours. In conclusion, I extend my warmest welcome to Steak N Shake, a true gem in the realm of gastronomy, and eagerly anticipate future visits to savor their mouthwatering creations.

"An establishment that serves as an optimal location for the consumption of coffee, offering a plethora of attributes that contribute to its exceptional nature. My affection towards this venue is profound, encompassing the ambiance, the surrounding area's distinct character, the skilled baristas, and the clientele, particularly the elderly Italian men who congregate outdoors, engaging in card games while savoring their espressos. This setting holds a distinguished position in my esteemed preferences."

"The complimentary tortilla chips and tangy salsa were served in copious amounts, ensuring a consistent flow of flavorful sustenance throughout our meal, sans any need for additional requests. My lunchtime selection, the Chile Relleno, was comprised of a triad of fresh components - the primary dish, accompanied by refried beans and rice - all of which demonstrated a commitment to quality and freshness. It would be challenging to envision a more satisfying culinary experience within the realm of Mexican cuisine, thereby rendering our return visits an inevitability."

"It is imperative that I extend a heartfelt endorsement to the itinerant oyster vendor situated on the pavement. Remarkable mollusks (indeed), cordial service, advantageously positioned (thus obviating the need for me to forcefully navigate through the throngs within the marketplace), and quite affordable. Offered at a mere dollar per piece, or a trifecta of three for five dollars, or six for ten dollars (or thereabouts), it is utterly impossible to refute the value proposition. On two separate occasions, I have had the pleasure of encountering distinct shuckers, both of whom exhibited exceptional amiability and engaging conversation. The mollusks are expertly shucked at the moment of purchase, and an assortment of condimentsâlemon, horseradish, and piquant sauceâare readily available at the humble kiosk. In the event that you chance to pass by, I urge you to halt and extend a salutation, accompanied by the acquisition of a fresh, chilled oyster. Aspiring to partake in this indulgence as a weekly ritual during clement weather, I am uncertain of their operational status during the winter months; thus, it is advisable to confirm their availability. Moreover, I have introduced an acquaintance hailing from outside the city, an authority on oysters, and his assessment was one of unadulterated approbation. Triumph!"
"The establishment itself boasts an impressive array of seafood options. As a native of Houston, accustomed to the likes of crawfish, catfish, and fried shrimp, I find myself preferring the variety presented here. While the prices may be slightly elevated, they are by no means exorbitant. The vibrant atmosphere of a seafood market is alive and well within these walls, and I must commend the proprietors for their dedication to providing an authentic San Franciscan experience in the heart of Pittsburgh. Additionally, they offer an assortment of goods beyond seafood, as well as delectable sidewalk oysters."

Just discovered this place today thanks to the stars given and reviews by you Yelpers out there and I gotta say that this is THEEEEE BEST place for breakfast in Vegas. Clean, great food at a great price and the friendliest service. Couldn't be happier for this find. Definitely a spot I will have to eat at least once every time I visit Vegas from now on. :)

"The Western burger at Zax epitomizes gastronomical excellence, its delectable flavors and textures constituting a culinary experience that transcends mortal limitations. The house salad, an ostensibly innocuous accompaniment, surprises with its unpretentious yet unwavering commitment to freshness and quality. The Italian sub, a veritable cornucopia of taste and texture, satiates even the most discerning palate. The new chicken strips, a recent addition to Zax's already impressive repertoire, elicit an unbridled enthusiasm that belies all attempts at restraint. The menu, a compendium of culinary mastery, caters to an array of gastronomical inclinations, ensuring that each patron can find solace in their particular penchant. The service, a paragon of attentiveness and warmth, personified by the affable Charlie and Rosanne, complements the exquisite fare, rendering Zax an establishment worthy of unwavering devotion."

The ambiance may appear daunting at first glance, but do not let the exterior facade deter you from experiencing the exceptional culinary delights that await within. As a repeat patron, I can personally attest to the fact that the proprietors possess an impressive ability to recall even the most minuscule details regarding their clientele's preferences, such as the desire for spicy mustard or not. The delectable offerings on the buffet are truly sublime, and I would highly recommend giving this establishment a chance to demonstrate its merits.

Nothing but great things to say about this steakhouse!  Gotta love the stellar service and the great people working here, also the food is amazing!  They do something special with each dish, each and every time, the bar is classic with my pals, Tommy and Craig who just know drinks and know how to have fun. 5star stuff here

"A truly exceptional and comprehensively equipped retail establishment, boasting a team of remarkably erudite, accommodating, and affable personnel who demonstrate an unwavering commitment to providing patrons with meticulous guidance and expert counsel, thereby ensuring that customers are adequately informed and empowered to make optimal decisions regarding their purchases, be it a novel bicycle or merely a new pump or wrench; furthermore, this enterprise maintains a state-of-the-art online presence, facilitating extensive research and exploration of their vast inventory prior to visiting the physical store, thus rendering it my most preferred bicycle retailer by a considerable margin."

"In commemoration of my recent passage into another year of life, my betrothed and an assemblage of acquaintances presented me with a culinary masterpiece from the esteemed Tammie Coe, which served as the focal point of their meticulously planned surprise celebration. This edible work of art, fashioned in the form of a gothic coffin, boasted an intricate design replete with ornate details that bordered on the breathtaking, while its interior housed a delectable amalgamation of rich red velvet and creamy cheesecake filling. The sheer aesthetic appeal of this confectionary marvel nearly precluded the notion of sullying its beauty by consuming it, yet the overwhelming desire to partake of its sublime flavors ultimately proved irresistible. Suffice it to say that the experience of savoring each bite of this divine creation served as a crowning touch to an already extraordinary occasion, and my sincere gratitude extends to Tammie Coe for their instrumental role in rendering my birthday festivities truly unforgettable."
I loved this place and would eat here almost once a week, but i went there Friday (5/27/11) and it said it was closed and relocating.

"Wherefore, pray tell, might one unearth palatable Indian cuisine amidst the sprawling cityscape of Las Vegas? Why, 'tis none other than the esteemed Bollywood Grill, my dear fellow! Verily, I daresay this eatery serves the most delectable Indian fare beyond the British Isles (where such culinary delights are as ubiquitous as Mexican victuals in Los Angeles) and may even rival the authentic flavors of the subcontinent itself.

The menu, akin to a silver screen extravaganza, segregates its offerings into three distinct categories: Previews, Opening Scenes, and Hits. And, by the stars, what a delightful assortment of savory treats! Particularly for those enamored with spicy curries.

I had the pleasure of indulging in their Chicken Karishma, a dish so exquisite it warranted a separate bowl of rice and a flame-adorned bowl for the curry, all presented with flair upon the table. The Trailers, those tantalizing appetizers, were nothing short of extraordinary. The pandoras, in particular, were a true gastronomic marvel.

Furthermore, the staff at Bollywood Grill exhibit an unwavering dedication to providing exceptional service, graciously elucidating the menu's intricacies without a trace of condescension or disdain. Truly, a standout local dining experience!"

"As all preceding reviews have mentioned, this establishment possesses an undeniable appeal, concealed as it is in a location that would prove challenging to discover without the aid of Yelp. One can only speculate on the increased volume of patrons this enterprise would attract if its site were more conspicuous. Upon entering, the proprietor promptly presented me with three pairs of high-waisted shorts for trial, demonstrating an uncanny ability to discern my size merely by visual assessment. Ultimately, I selected a vintage pair of Levi shorts, which fit excellently and boasted an aesthetic that was both fashionable and tasteful. While the distressed variants of these garments are priced at around $50, the pair I purchased, being unaltered, cost a mere $25âa truly reasonable sum, in my opinion. It is certainly worthwhile to pay a visit to this store; both men and women will find an array of apparel options available."

"I perpetually find myself in pursuit of sushi establishments situated on the western periphery of the city... and this particular eatery has proven to be a veritable triumph. By combining an inventive menu featuring an array of imaginative dishes, generous portions that cater to the needs of patrons with discerning tastes, and prices that are eminently reasonable and accessible to a wide range of consumers, this restaurant has successfully created a formula for success. Furthermore, the proprietor and staff members have demonstrated a remarkable level of cordiality and loquacity, which serves as an additional asset that undoubtedly contributes to the overall appeal of this culinary establishment."

I visited Purrfect Auto situated on St. Rose/Eastern with the intention of having my oil altered, but upon arrival, they recommended that I required novel brakes. Being cognizant of the dubious practices exercised at that particular site, I promptly refused the service. Nevertheless, to ensure that I was acting prudently, I opted to acquire a supplementary viewpoint. As a result, I decided to visit Professional Brake Service due to its exceptional ratings on both Google and Yelp, with the aim of verifying whether indeed I necessitated brakes.  

Upon entering the establishment, Mary, who serves as one of the proprietors, was stationed behind the front desk. She displayed remarkable hospitality and amiability, ensuring that I obtained the optimal level of service. Following the examination of my brakes by the technicians, she informed me that my front disc brakes were nowhere near requiring replacement, and my rear drum brakes still had approximately a year before needing attention. Unlike many establishments that would not hesitate to offer me unnecessary services, this particular business upheld honesty.  

Although she proposed an adjustment, which seemed reasonable. Moreover, I possessed a coupon that I had printed from their website, thereby rendering the cost highly affordable. Additionally, I was delighted to learn that future adjustments would be complimentary, allowing me to visit their facility every 3-6 months without incurring any additional expenses. Undoubtedly, the term "free" possesses immense appeal.  

In conclusion, if you are seeking a reliable and trustworthy service provider for your automobile's brakes, I wholeheartedly endorse Professional Brake Service. Their workmanship is of exceptional quality, their assistance is extraordinary, their demeanor is warm and welcoming, and their commitment to honesty is unwavering. Indeed, it is challenging to request anything more.

"Subsequent to registering and gaining admittance, my experience proved to be satisfactory.  I deemed the cost to be reasonable and feasible.  Furthermore, I was afforded sufficient space to maneuver and situate myself within my designated area.  The true test of this endeavor shall lie in my impending return, whereupon I shall transport sixty feet of truck and travel trailer, at which point the efficacy of this venture shall be truly assessed."
The spring rolls are out of this world. The pho is good. We went for lunch and had no problem getting a seat. Cheap and delicious.

My boyfriend and I are regulars to this place! We love fukuburger so much it's unreal, probably one of the best burgers I've had so far. The tamago burger & the jazz fries is our favorites, we would take a bullet for that burger. We recently tried the katsu burger as well and it's also very good ! The environment is set for youngins like us, I'm not too sure if it's a place for older generation to eat at but I mean, the food is marvelous in our opinion regardless!

"My culinary predilection gravitates towards the spicy chicken teriyaki low-carb plate, as it offers a distinctive deviation from traditional Japanese cuisine. The vegetables accompanying the dish are of exceptional quality, particularly the cabbage, which harmonizes with the other components to create a delectable experience for my taste buds. I would highly recommend giving it a try, as the yokisaba and regular chicken teriyaki plates also boast an impressive level of gastronomic excellence, thanks to the meticulous selection of ingredients that translates into a scrumptious finished product."

"Indubitably, this culinary haven offers an unparalleled assortment of delectable sweets, boasting a palette-pleasing array of crepes, gelato, chocolates, and numerous other confectionaries that cater to the most discerning palates. Each meticulously crafted delicacy is a feast for both the eyes and the taste buds, making it a challenge to resist the temptation to indulge in their delightful offerings. The gelato, in particular, showcases a diverse medley of flavors, all of which are executed flawlessly, while their sandwiches, pastries, and coffee are equally impressive. This paradise for those with a sweet tooth is further complemented by the convenience of online ordering via jpchocolates.com, thus ensuring that satisfying one's sugar cravings has never been easier."

"Wow, this location offers an optical feast for those who relish in the satisfaction of arranging their belongings in a stylish and distinctive manner, while simultaneously providing a hospitable ambiance wherein the staff exhibit cordiality and proficiency in their area of expertise. Notwithstanding the idiosyncratic configuration of my closet, they manifested no apprehensions regarding the feasibility of devising innovative solutions tailored to accommodate my unique requirements. I would unhesitatingly return to this establishment upon acquiring my subsequent abode, as the value surpasses the cost."

"We contacted Water Heater Pro's on a Sunday afternoon, and they provided us with a quotation and arranged for a subsequent morning arrival. They demonstrated exemplary punctuality by arriving precisely at the appointed hour, sans any lateness. The team executed the agreed-upon tasks, and their charges remained consistent with the initial estimate. In fact, we felt compelled to offer a gratuity due to their genuine commitment to customer satisfaction and refusal to engage in opportunistic price gouging. The entire process was completed within sixty minutes, and our water heater is now fully operational. Notably, our attempts to solicit quotes from various competitors were unsuccessful, as they were unable to provide even an approximate estimate without imposing a $50 visitation fee. We extend our gratitude to Yelp and a friendly referral for introducing us to this exceptional service provider. Water Heater Pro's has earned our highest recommendation due to their integrity, professionalism, and impressive work ethic."

I have had the pleasure of partaking in numerous dining experiences at esteemed steakhouses across various metropolitan areas, customarily opting for a New York Sirloin cut. However, my recent culinary excursion to Botero steakhouse proved to be an unparalleled gastronomic adventure, as I savored a steak of unprecedented quality. Upon specifying my preference for a medium-rare doneness, I was presented with a masterfully cooked cut, boasting a warm, rosy interior complemented by a flavorful, caramelized crust. Furthermore, the generous portion size and meticulous trimming of the steak left me feeling utterly satiated. While I did find the selection of wine available by the glass to be somewhat limited, with only a single Cabernet Sauvignon option priced at $25, I must admit that the other red wine offerings under $20 showcased an impressive array of choices.

"BOOM!  5 Stars....   this place is phenomenal...  every individual within the establishment exudes proficiency and self-assurance in their work...  They possess comprehensive knowledge regarding my account and when faced with an inquiry beyond their expertise, they seamlessly collaborate with colleagues who possess the requisite information...   Occasionally, the atmosphere becomes hectic, yet this is a natural byproduct of diligently striving for excellence...  Through repeated interactions, I have developed unwavering faith in select personnel who manage my account, and their consistent display of exceptional service has yet to falter...  Maintain this impressive standard!"

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment! The customer service is of exceptional quality, with staff members who are remarkably well-informed and accommodating. They possess the ability to proficiently address my inquiries and, in instances where they are uncertain of the response, they exhibit a willingness to diligently seek out the information on my behalf. The prices at this location are highly competitive, with rates that are frequently lower than those of rival businesses. The store's dimensions are ideally suited to accommodate a broad range of products that cater to my needs, thereby making it an optimal shopping destination. In conclusion, this venue ranks among my most preferred places to browse and purchase goods."
The best cheese steak and pastrami sandwich in Vegas. this is a place for take out. They have a sitting area but its small and not to comfortable. But the sandwiches are great!!!

"The restaurant provided an expedited service that was remarkably swift, proficient, and efficient, ensuring that patrons' time was optimized and their satisfaction was of paramount importance. My server, James, exhibited exceptional hospitality, possessing a demeanor that was both affable and attentive, thereby enhancing the overall dining experience. The culinary offerings were not only sumptuous but also expertly prepared, with each dish showcasing a masterful blend of flavors, textures, and presentation. Of particular note were the potatoes, which were skillfully cooked to perfection, artfully seasoned with aromatic herbs and onions, and tantalizingly tender. The pricing, though moderate in comparison to other establishments serving breakfast fare, proved to be eminently reasonable, considering the exceptional quality of the cuisine and the superior level of service provided. In conclusion, my dining experience at this establishment was utterly flawless, leaving me with no criticisms or complaints whatsoever; indeed, I would eagerly return, eager to partake in the delectable fare and exceptional service once again."

"My culinary experience at this esteemed establishment was nothing short of exceptional, primarily due to the exquisite presentation of the delectable dishes, which not only tantalized my taste buds but also showcased an artistic flair that elevated the overall dining experience to a level of unparalleled sophistication."

"I recently visited this esteemed lodging establishment on a professional excursion, and let me tell you, it's a tough life indeed. The hotel's ambiance exudes an unparalleled level of elegance, with no discernible odor of cigarette smoke permeating the gaming area. My accommodations were nothing short of sumptuous, boasting an impressive array of luxurious amenities that left me feeling utterly pampered. The hospitality we received was truly exceptional, with the staff displaying an unwavering commitment to ensuring our every need was met with unparalleled proficiency. Alas, we did not spend an excessive amount of time indulging in the casino's offerings, as we were eager to explore the myriad delights that the famed Las Vegas Strip has to offer. \n\nWe partook in a delectable repast in one of the conference rooms situated on the uppermost level of the hotel, accompanied by our colleagues from the workplace. The culinary offerings were truly superlative, with the prime rib being a particular highlight. In my opinion, it would be challenging to find a superior dining experience on the Strip. Suffice it to say, we shall most certainly be returning to this esteemed establishment in the near future, eager to once again indulge in its unrivaled hospitality and luxury."

"As I compose this missive, I find myself inexplicably influenced by the odious sentiments espoused by 2 Live Crew, an occurrence that has precipitated a profound metamorphosis in my demeanor, such that I now exude an unprecedented level of chauvinism; forgive me, dear reader, for I am merely a product of my environment. It is worth mentioning that there exist two salient aspects of this establishment that serve to encapsulate my entire existence, and they are as follows: firstly, consider treating a female acquaintance to a midday repast at this venue, as it will undoubtedly enhance your image in her eyes, transforming you into a suitor who appears both perceptive and refined; to achieve this end, it may prove beneficial to pepper your conversation with phrases such as 'I sense...' or 'When Carrie presented her assistant with that luxurious Louis Vuitton item...'; secondly, it is imperative that you sample the Mushroom tart, or perhaps it would be more accurate to describe it as a tort, given its complexion and texture. Adhering to these recommendations, gentlemen, will ensure that your experience at this eatery is nothing short of extraordinary. I bid you good fortune and Godspeed in your endeavors."

I have seen Dr Hurley a few times over the past year to help with my allergies and sleep issues.  He's been great.  A professional who listens to your concerns and doesn't just jump into prescribing medication or recommending surgery.  He explains what's going on and what he recommends for treatment.  If you don't feel comfortable with it, he'll offer alternative treatment options.  This is how all doctors should be.  You also don't feel rushed, like you're a number.

I'm glad I found Dr Hurley and most of all, I'm glad he's covered by my insurance!

Return Factor - 100%

"The Wax Genie constitutes my novel waxing apparatus, and my recent Brazilian waxing experience exemplified a comprehensive and meticulous approach, while simultaneously manifesting a marked diminution in the level of discomfort typically associated with such procedures, thereby rendering it a decidedly favorable and recommendable venture."

If I could confer upon The Cottage a rating of 10 stars, I undoubtedly would! This charming establishment in Queen Creek persistently impresses me with its exceptional staff and captivating ambiance. The quaint cottage itself is a veritable gem that beckons visitors to pause and revel in its beauty. Upon entering, one cannot help but feel enveloped by an atmosphere of warmth and hospitality. \

On the occasion of my daughter's birthday, we paid a visit to The Cottage and acquired several diminutive trinkets intended for her fairy garden. My daughter expresses a fervent desire to return to the shop at least once weekly! However, I must caution that The Cottage may not be the most suitable venue for young children, as they may become overwhelmed by the numerous objects on display and potentially cause unintended chaos. Nonetheless, for older children who can appreciate the wares without touching them, the experience remains enjoyable. \

In honor of our anniversary, I requested a floral arrangement from The Cottage for my spouse, and despite my lack of familiarity with floristry, their knowledgeable staff skillfully assembled an exquisite bouquet that exceeded our expectations! My spouse and I were both thoroughly impressed, and furthermore, their efforts earned me considerable favor with my better half â?an added bonus! \

The flower arrangements provided by The Cottage are consistently fresh and long-lasting, often enduring for a fortnight or longer. Their beauty is truly breathtaking, and I assure you that the photos I shall take and share subsequently will serve as evidence of their exceptional quality. \

A word of advice: due to limited parking space behind the building and challenging ingress/egress, it is advisable to park along the street instead.

"You utter phrases in the Italian language in my direction and proffer scrumptious, spirit-elevating coconut gelato embellished with minuscule shards of chocolate?! My goodness gracious, such an offer conjures up images of a culinary paradise, a veritable haven of gastronomical delight! Alas, fate has ordained that your establishment lies some thirty miles distant from my present location, rendering it unfeasible for me to partake in the delectable delights you describe. However, I assure you that, were it feasible, I would unhesitatingly undertake a pilgrimage of sorts, braving even the sweltering heat of 116 degrees Fahrenheit, all for the sake of savoring the sublime flavors that your edible creations have to offer."

"My spouse and I have partaken in culinary excursions to Kickstand on two separate occasions, and upon both visits, we departed with feelings of satisfaction and contentment. During our initial visit, we elected to indulge in their 'build-a-burger' option, whereby I opted for a singular patty, complemented by cheddar cheese and an English muffin, which was subsequently toasted to a golden brown perfection. On a subsequent visit, I opted for a wheat bun, yet the English muffin remains the superior choice, in my opinion. 

In addition, I have sampled their tater tots and French fries, with the former edging out the latter in terms of overall quality. My better half, however, decided to indulge in the gourmet corn on the cob, which, regrettably, featured an excessive amount of embellishments, such as cheese, butter, and salt, thereby diminishing its inherent flavor. 

Furthermore, we ordered the layered nachos, which were indeed palatable, yet a recommendation from JJ, to sample the pimento cheese fries, has piqued our interest, and we intend to try them in the near future. 

Moreover, Kickstand boasts an impressive array of ciders on draft, including Red's Apple Ale, which is available at a discounted price of $3.50 for a 22oz serving on Fridays, making it an unbeatable offer."

"The exaggerated buzz encircling this eatery is thoroughly justified, as our visit exemplified. The culinary mastery of the Reina Pepiada and Shredded Beef manifested in their delectable flavors, while the hospitable demeanor of the proprietor further enhanced our dining experience. We eagerly anticipate our next visit and unhesitatingly endorse this establishment with an unequivocal A+++++++ rating."

One of the Best French restaurant i have ever had. Id you order The Grand Plateau you will not be disappointedIII The lobster and Oyster were exceptionally fresh and tasty. Next come the main course Steak \"Bouchon\" Rare!!! Truly an Amazing steak!!!\nI would definitely come back next time i am in Vegas

"Indubitably, the most scrumptious cheese steak resides west of Philadelphia, boasting an unparalleled flavor profile that transcends its eastern counterparts. Accompanying this gastronomic masterpiece are delectable fries and potato chips, which serve as the perfect complement to the main attraction. Of note, a recent enhancement in the bread department has elevated the cheese steak experience to unprecedented heights, with the introduction of new rolls that harmoniously complement the savory ingredients within. Furthermore, for those who seek to deviate from the traditional beef variety, a chicken cheese steak option is available, which, quite frankly, may surpass the original in terms of sheer culinary brilliance."

```
It required a brief interval of approximately two minutes to procure our delectable chipotle burgers, which were tantamount to an epicurean delight. The complementary sweet potato fries were equally scrumptious and contributed to the overall satisfaction of our culinary experience. However, I lamented the omission of pastrami from our repast, as it would have augmented the richness of our meal; nevertheless, the burger proved sufficient to satiate my hunger. Consequently, I shall make it a point to partake in some pastrami during my subsequent visit to Las Vegas.
```

"As satisfactory as it can get in Pittsburgh!  Upon my return, the hospitality was remarkably attentive and efficient.  The steak was cooked to perfection, and the generous serving size allowed me to enjoy an ample amount for lunch the following day.  The crab cake appetizer was truly exceptional, and the delectable dessert (consistent with my previous experiences) was sublime. \n\nAlthough the prices may be slightly elevated, the restaurant offers commensurate portion sizes and fosters a sophisticated dining ambiance, making it an ideal venue for special occasions or romantic evenings when entertaining guests or enjoying a hot date night."

This establishment boasts the pinnacle of diversion, as evidenced by my personal experience, which culminated in an unforgettable nocturnal excursion characterized by a lavish poolside soiree that afforded me and my associates preferential treatment, including VIP access and exemption from pecuniary responsibilities, thereby enabling us to indulge in the festivities unhindered and uninhibited, as we partook in the merriment and revelry that permeated the atmosphere, ultimately resulting in an evening that shall remain indelible in my memory.

"Marquee Nightclub, located on the renowned Las Vegas Strip, offers an unparalleled nightlife experience that caters to those seeking an ardent and exhilarating atmosphere. With its premier DJs, extensive array of amenities, and superior ambiance, Marquee has established itself as my preferred nightlife destination. The club's proficient staff expertly curates the perfect blend of musical genres, ensuring an electrifying and dynamic environment that fosters an unforgettable night out. Furthermore, Marquee's spacious patio area, which features a state-of-the-art tented enclosure during the winter months, provides an idyllic setting for socializing and relaxation. While the club's entrance can be somewhat challenging, with multiple queues and rigorous security protocols, the overall experience far surpasses any inconvenience. Additionally, Marquee boasts some of the most impressive visual displays, including cutting-edge light shows and laser performances, which complement the exceptional service provided by the club's attentive and knowledgeable waitstaff."

"Our second visitation to this culinary establishment has reaffirmed our profound appreciation for its gastronomical offerings, having previously partaken in their dinner menu. On this particular occasion, we opted for the $5 Happy Hour, a veritable cornucopia of delectable delights, featuring an array of tantalizing appetizers at a most reasonable price point. The beef skewers, in particular, demonstrated exceptional quality and flavor, garnering unanimous acclaim from our party. The attentive and personable service provided by Sarah and Dave, the bartenders, greatly enhanced our dining experience, ensuring a prompt and seamless delivery of culinary delights. It is worth noting that the $5 Happy Hour is available daily, with the exception of Saturdays, although rumors suggest a potential expansion of this promotional offering in the future. Our fervent anticipation for a subsequent visit is underscored by the exemplary quality of the cuisine, customer service, and overall ambiance."

"Smoke, an unpretentious eatery in the Pittsburgh vicinity, offers a culinary experience that transcends the conventional boundaries of casual dining. Allow us to dispel any misconceptions. This establishment does not conform to the traditional Mexican taco paradigm, where the focus lies on the delicate corn tortilla. Instead, the flour tortilla serves as a mere vessel for the diverse array of smoked meats, showcasing Smoke's unique genre-bending identity.  
While the restaurant's intimate size and leisurely pace may deter some, we implore patrons to embrace the philosophy that quality precedes quantity. To optimize your experience, follow this advice: tender your name and then proceed to Blue Dust, a nearby watering hole, for a libation. Smoke will thoughtfully notify you when a table becomes available. Remember, cash and BYOB (Bring Your Own Booze) are de rigueur, although fresh margarita mixers and an assortment of other beverages are available for your enjoyment. For the teetotalers among you, sample the horchata, a refreshing and flavorful alternative.  
The menu boasts an array of standout items, including the rib taco, which we liken to a gourmet McRib sandwich, featuring premium ingredients. Other notable selections include the brisket, chicken apple, veggie, and BLT options. However, the breakfast taco, served throughout the day and customizable with your preferred meat, reigns supreme as a customer favorite.  
Insiders tip: Thursdays hold a special secret - wings, smoked and fried to perfection, that disappear quickly. Plan your visit accordingly to indulge in these fiery, delectable morsels. On rare occasions, a sweet treat awaits the fortunate patron. Homemade chocolate brownies adorned with peanut butter marscapone frosting leave even the most discerning palates in awe."

I thoroughly concur with the consensus among previous patrons regarding the exceptional quality of this taco establishment, which undoubtedly ranks among the premier eateries serving Mexican cuisine in the Las Vegas Valley. The crispy beef tacos, in particular, bear a striking resemblance to those served at a renowned taco bar in Santa Cruz, boasting a golden-brown, deep-fried exterior that yields to a delightfully tender and flavorful shredded beef filling. It is highly recommended that you sample this culinary masterpiece for yourself, as it has the potential to leave you utterly spellbound.

I hurt my neck yesterday and couldn't move at all. Instead of just sitting at home and waiting to get better I went and got checked out by Dr.Troy. When I left there I was feeling 100% better and was able to go back to work. Thanks Dr Troy!!

This establishment represents one of my most cherished retail destinations, offering an impressive array of tea-related products at exceptionally reasonable price points. In addition to their extensive selection of teas, they also purvey an assortment of delectable coffee varieties, thereby catering to diverse consumer preferences. The shop's inventory boasts an abundance of tea infusers, encompassing an array of styles and designs, such as those resembling traditional tea bags and others featuring playful motifs, like a monkey-shaped infuser. The store's personnel exude warmth and cordiality, fostering a welcoming atmosphere for patrons, while their apparent expertise in the realm of tea and associated accessories inspires confidence in their ability to provide informed guidance and recommendations.

Friendly staff, fun vibe, and somedays a wait. But thats what happens when your know for using local ingredients, being creative with them and hitting the spot every time to return for more. I highly recommend

   -Baked oatmeal topped with brown sugar & milk
   -Daily made from scratch bakery
   -Smoked gouda Grits
   -Weekend brunch special (posted on their facebook & twitter the friday before)

Deeelicious!  The first time my wife and I went here, we were amazed at how NOT busy it was.  Every restaurant in the Phoenix area seems to be constantly busy - every day - but not this one!  Each time we have been here, we have either been the only people in the place or one of only 2 occupied tables!  Weird!  We asked our server about this and were told they do a lot of take-out business.  We have noticed this to be true on our visits.  Ok - on to the food.  We have had pizza, pasta, entrees, and sandwiches.  All of it was good (with the exception of one weird chicken parm), but the best thing is definitely the pizza!  We love their pizza, especially the Amante Special!  It is very very good!  The crust is tender and sturdy without taking over the whole pie.  The sauce is tasty but not overbearing.  There are always plenty of toppings on each slice.  The sandwiches come in a close second, with our favorite being the canadian bacon one - yum!  My wife says they have the BEST caesar salad she has ever had - sometimes she has to get 2 to satisfy her craving!  I would agree that the salads are good - I generally get the side house salad with ranch dressing.  It is always fresh and crisp with lots of veggies.  All-in-all we will definitely continue to eat at this restaurant!

First time here!  I'm not a big sushi fan but I must say that it was pretty darn good. I got the Cali roll,  avacado roll and the double shrimp roll. They make it right there on the spot. \n\nI love expresso drinks and tried their White Mocha and it was great! This place is a must try.

Have been following these guys for awhile now on Twitter getting ready for our upcoming, now over :( vacation to Phoenix. Lucky for us we were in town for the Scottsdale Art Festival and their usual Friday stop on 7th Street in Phoenix at Urban Cookies. The months of anticipation DID NOT disappoint upon our arrival at the truck. Along with myself, my wife and kids were AMAZED by the flavor and overall size of these Quesadillas!! We tried Steak and Blue and their weekly special which was the Carne Asada I do believe along with the chips and the Luncharitas in both Horchata and Mango Pineapple, all which made for a GREAT GREAT lunch! There was a line of people which was great to see for the LL Crew and a good majority brought back their Lucharita mason jars as you get $1.00 off on your next drink when you trade in you old jar for a new one, a great way to keep the people coming, and boy that they were, the line 12-15 people deep! And most importantly the staff...they are great!! Which makes it even better...we can't wait to see them again on our next trip. If your ever in OH-IO let us know :) Thanks again and thanks for remembering our Anniversary!!

Crazy Otto's is indeed an unconventional eatery, where the conventional rules of dining do not apply. Unaware of its limited operating hours, we arrived at 1:50 p.m., mere minutes before the posted closing time of 2:00 p.m. To our surprise, the accommodating waitstaff welcomed us with open arms, expressing their willingness to serve us despite our tardy arrival. Engaging in conversation, we discussed the economic challenges faced by restaurants and the importance of catering to late-night diners. The culinary offerings at Crazy Otto's are undoubtedly delectable, and the ambiance is eccentric, to say the least. As the waiter quipped, "Check your license plate on the way out; it might end up on the wall!"  My quest for a satisfying BLT led me to Crazy Otto's, and my expectations were exceeded by the generous portion of succulent bacon, perfectly complemented by a generous dollop of mayonnaise. The onion ring appetizer, comprising five substantial rings, was a delightful surprise, equivalent in quantity to a large fast-food order.  I eagerly anticipate my return to Crazy Otto's, where I can indulge in the restaurant's unique charm and savor its mouthwatering cuisine once again.

"It is truly a rarity to encounter a setting where the personnel genuinely relish their work, and my recent visit to I Heart Vape served as a reaffirmation of this notion. While in town over the weekend, I noticed a relative dearth of vape shops in close proximity to the strip, which prompted me to conduct a search for establishments that would be open at an early hour. Ultimately, I opted to pay a visit to I Heart Vape, as the alternative location I had in mind was delayed in its opening time.  

Upon entering the store, I was immediately struck by the vast array of products available, ranging from novice-friendly stick batteries to high-end Mods. As a resident of Los Angeles, I have occasionally found it challenging to obtain specific types of clearomizers, particularly those with ego threading; however, I Heart Vape boasted an impressive selection, which included three EVOD clearomizers that I ultimately chose to purchase.  

The staff members present were not only extremely knowledgeable regarding their product offerings but also displayed a laudable level of attentiveness and friendliness. They shared information regarding forthcoming plans and events, including the exciting prospect of a DIY juice bar, which piqued my interest and left me eager to witness the realization of these ventures."

"It is my utmost pleasure to express my profound affection towards this establishment, as I have had the privilege of experiencing exceptional service, characterized by a lack of haste and a meticulous approach that culminates in an impressive completion of tasks within a reasonable time frame."

My better half has an immense fondness for the quaint cupcake bakery, thereby rendering it a veritable panacea for any conjugal dilemmas that may arise; cognizant of this, I opt to procure said delectable treat as a means of assuaging her ire, thereby ensuring her felicity. The establishment's provision of a delivery service serves as a boon for those hosting social gatherings or corporate events, as it obviates the need for physical transportation of the culinary delights. Furthermore, I must confess that I, too, derive pleasure from partaking in these scrumptious morsels; specifically, the coconut variant ranks high on my list of preferences.
Grab a bagel and head to a nearby park. Eat delicious bagel. Contemplate going back for another. \n\nHad the everything with salmon and cream cheese. Delicious!

"I have recently had the privilege of commencing my studies at this esteemed institution, and I must say that my experience thus far has been nothing short of exceptional. The atmosphere is conducive to learning, with a team of educators who are not only knowledgeable but also passionate about imparting their expertise to their students. Furthermore, the physical structure of the building is a testament to the institute's commitment to excellence, boasting state-of-the-art facilities that exude an aura of modernity and cleanliness. And let's not forget the Aveda products, which lend an unmistakable air of elegance to the entire establishment. For anyone seeking to embark on a career in cosmetology, I would enthusiastically endorse exploring the possibility of enrolling at the Aveda Institute; I assure you that your expectations will be more than met."
If you want a great, big sandwich, this is the place to go! They are friendly, fast and the food is amazing! I recommend the slaw-b-joe and the capastrami.

"Upon every visit to this culinary establishment, I consistently encounter exceptional, cordial, and hospitable service. The proprietors are frequently astonished by my predilection for fiery cuisine and are often eager to introduce me to novel dishes they take pleasure in preparing. 

In the company of two acquaintances from Japan, I had the pleasure of partaking in a meal at this eatery on a recent Tuesday. As fate would have it, the woman who attended to our table spoke Japanese with greater fluency than myself, thereby enabling her to elucidate certain intricate dishes and extend a sense of welcome to my companions. 

I shall unquestionably return to this restaurant on a regular basis, as my fondness for delectable Korean cuisine remains unwavering. Furthermore, I find immense amusement in observing Korean dramas unfold on the television screen during my visits, particularly when they feature emotional outbursts or physical displays of affection with great frequency within a brief span of time."

I have had the pleasure of residing at this esteemed establishment for approximately thirty days, and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed. As an individual who spends a considerable amount of time traveling for business purposes, I have had the opportunity to experience a wide range of accommodations, and I can confidently state that this particular hotel ranks among the finest extended-stay establishments I have had the privilege of visiting. The staff members are exceptionally courteous, friendly, and professional, creating a welcoming atmosphere that greatly enhances the overall experience for guests. Notably, they have demonstrated a remarkable ability to cater to the needs of both human and canine visitors, as evidenced by their warm welcome of my furry companion and the reasonable $110 non-refundable fee associated with their stay. Furthermore, the culinary offerings at this hotel are truly impressive, with a vast array of options available for breakfast that are sure to satisfy even the most discerning palates. The layout of the hotel, designed to resemble a series of apartments, provides guests with a unique sense of privacy and seclusion, further enhancing the feeling of comfort and relaxation. Other notable amenities include reliable complimentary Wi-Fi, well-appointed kitchens complete with ovens, and exceptional staff services, all of which combine to create a truly unparalleled lodging experience.

A relaxed drinking establishment with an ambiance that exudes a sense of ease and informality, where the decor and furnishings convey a sense of being well-used and cared for.  The culinary offerings are delectable and priced at a level that is reasonable and affordable.  I had the pleasure of partaking in a midday repast at this establishment today, despite encountering some difficulty navigating through the construction-related traffic congestion en route.  My dining companion and I both opted for traditional fare, specifically the Shepherds Pie (a satisfying and familiar dish that epitomizes comfort food) and the fish and chips (a flavorful and satisfying meal that is similarly evocative of a bygone era), respectively.  The venue boasts an extensive selection of beers, served by friendly and attentive servers, within an atmosphere that is conducive to conviviality and enjoyment - making it a location that is certainly worthy of a visit and one that I hope to have the opportunity to experience again in the near future.

"It is truly astounding to experience such a profound sense of comfort and familiarity within these walls, which serves as a testament to the exceptional hospitality and dedication of the proprietor, who not only possesses an impressive depth of knowledge regarding cultural nuances but also remains steadfastly informed about pertinent contemporary issues, thereby creating an atmosphere that is both welcoming and intellectually stimulating."

We thoroughly enjoy the ambiance, as all mixologists are cordial and exceptional individuals. I have the pleasure of frequenting this establishment on a daily basis, accompanied by Tara and our associates. Their vegetable-based pasta dish is truly delectable. In the event that you encounter a large gathering occupying the outdoor seating area, rest assured that it is merely our coterie indulging in a jovial experience!

All of the vendors here are great. They are here year round although the heard thins in the summer due to the heat. Everything from fresh roasted coffee, fresh baked bread, fruits & vegetables to custom length golf clubs.... What more do you need from a market!

The personnel were all remarkably conversant with the diverse assortment of brews and roasts they had available, exhibiting a profound understanding of their products that was truly impressive. Moreover, they were all incredibly affable, engendering a warm and welcoming ambiance that greatly enhanced our visit. My companion was particularly enthralled by the White Zombie, evincing an unbridled enthusiasm that bordered on obsession; indeed, she subsequently recounted experiencing recurring nocturnal reveries centered upon this caffeinated concoction. As for myself, I opted for the cold brew, which proved to be an astute choice, as its sublime flavor and refreshing qualities left me thoroughly impressed. Ultimately, I felt compelled to acquire two bags of beans to take with me, such was my satisfaction with the establishment's offerings.

"The culinary offerings at Dish are truly exceptional, and my recent dining experience there was nothing short of extraordinary. The service provided by the waitstaff was remarkably attentive and personalized, and the flavorsome fare that was presented before me was utterly delectable. However, I must admit that the ambient noise level within the establishment was somewhat bothersome, and I would recommend selecting a table situated at a remove from the bar area in order to optimize one's dining experience. Additionally, it is worth noting that the lighting within the restaurant could benefit from improvement, but this minor drawback did not detract significantly from the overall enjoyment of my meal. Needless to say, I am eagerly anticipating my next visit to Dish, whenever I may find myself in the vicinity of Pittsburgh once again."

"My affection for visiting this MAC store for a comprehensive cosmetic application with a $50.00 product acquisition is immense, as the artisans there are remarkably talented and proficient in their craft, delivering an exceptionally meticulous and professional service. I have had the pleasure of experiencing their expertise on multiple occasions, specifically for various events that take place throughout the year, and Effie, my designated make-up artist, has consistently demonstrated an unparalleled level of skill in her craftsmanship, particularly in the realm of highlighting and contouring, resulting in a flawless, picture-perfect finish. Were it financially feasible, I would unquestionably opt to partake in this indulgence daily, as the transformative powers of such an elaborate cosmetic application are truly remarkable. Thus, I wholeheartedly endorse visiting MAC for a complete make-over accompanied by a product purchase, as the inclusion of a set of their high-quality eyelashes will undoubtedly enhance the overall aesthetic impact, culminating in a resounding satisfaction and contentment. My sincere gratitude extends to Effie for the exquisite cosmetic design she created for me yesterday."

"Ideal for those seeking to initiate their day at the hotel with expediency, this establishment offers unrestricted entry and exit, thereby obviating the need for guests to adhere to restrictive time constraints, while also providing an optimal environment for indulging in libations, albeit at a cost that may be perceived as slightly elevated in comparison to the standard prices offered at gaming establishments."

There are few times in life when you will be shopping for an Engagement ring and i was Finally in the market for one. I went to three locations prior to walking into Galicia's fine jewelry in scottsdale. my Prior experiences before going to Galicia fine jewelry were nothing but Confusing and feeling pressured. The staff at Galicia's were Amazing And needless to say on that day i walked out with the most beautiful ring for the Most beautiful and deserving woman in my life. Thank you Galicia For making my day an my life special.
Only go here for shows upstairs, but love it as a venue. Sound is a lot better than most venues of similar size. Only thing that sucks is trying to find parking.

"I would unhesitatingly endorse this enterprise. Following my conversation with Jeff, one of the proprietors, I arranged for an appointment. Throughout our discussion regarding the services incorporated into the carpet shampooing process, he displayed exceptional meticulousness. The specialists, Mike and Omar, arrived punctually, conducted themselves in a highly professional manner, actively listened to my specific concerns, and assured me of their work's quality. They even went beyond my expectations by contacting me the following day to verify my satisfaction. Kudos to the team! Moreover, I will unquestionably recommend J2 Cleaning to my acquaintances and loved ones."

"Culinary excellence abounds at this esteemed eatery, as we indulged in an array of delectable dishes, including Steak Kew, chicken fried rice, crab angels, BBQ Ribs, chicken lo me in, and sweet and sour pork.  Each dish was meticulously prepared, ensuring an unparalleled freshness, succulence, and tenderness.  Moreover, the absence of monosodium glutamate (MSG) in their culinary creations elevates the gastronomic experience to a healthier level.  The hospitable staff, led by the affable Mae, provided exceptional service that complemented the exquisite fare.  Furthermore, the generous portion sizes left us feeling satiated but not overly full, thereby avoiding the regretful sensation of overindulgence often associated with dining establishments serving excessively large helpings.  Kudos to the proprietors for their commitment to quality, customer satisfaction, and wholesome cuisine!"

GIGANTIC with an abundance of retail establishments! I experienced considerable disorientation at this colossal, two-level shopping center, struggling to maintain my bearings, reconcile which areas I had previously investigated, and pinpoint the specific stores I aspired to visit. This immense structure houses an extensive array of shops and services, including a sizable food court featuring numerous dining options, a Harkins's cinema, Yogurtland, and a plethora of additional retailers, rendering it a truly remarkable destination. Notwithstanding the substantial parking area designed to accommodate the multitude of patrons, a visit to this venue can be a thoroughly enjoyable experience, particularly when allowed ample time for exploration.

"As a native Angeleno, I have been fortunate enough to have had all of my snowboarding necessities met by a diminutive, privately-owned board shop, wherein one of the employees not only installed my novel snowboard rack onto my vehicle but also elucidated the distinction between Burton and Nidecker or NeverSummer snowboards, the latter two being of superior quality compared to the former. Hence, I wholeheartedly endorse patronizing smaller enterprises. Upon relocating to Las Vegas, I was delighted to discover that Powder and Sun, a local ski and snowboard boutique, provided the same level of attention to detail, dedication, and enthusiasm that I had grown accustomed to in Los Angeles. Following a comprehensive snowboard tuning process, which involved manually sharpening the edges using an iron wax applicator, Tim, the shop's knowledgeable staff member, devoted over an hour of his time attempting to rectify the issues with my bindings, which had been hastily repaired on the mountain, and even offered to contact the manufacturer on my behalf to obtain the necessary replacement components. His customer service was truly exceptional and refreshingly devoid of the customary sales pressure often encountered at larger sporting goods retailers. Consequently, Powder and Sun has earned my loyalty and unwavering recommendation to anyone seeking top-notch ski and snowboard gear and expertise."

"Gastronomical excellence permeates the culinary offerings at this establishment, specifically within the realm of Bar food. My personal experience has led me to the unequivocal conclusion that the fare served here is of superior quality, with the Popper Burger being a prime example of such gustatory delights. This delectable dish is composed of a juicy patty enveloped by a crispy breaded exterior, complemented by the tangy flavor of cream cheese and the satisfying crunch of onions that have been golden fried to a state of sublime crispiness. Furthermore, a request for the piquant jalapeno sauce is imperative, as it serves to elevate the overall taste experience to an even loftier plane of culinary satisfaction. Additionally, the assortment of beverages available is equally impressive, with my personal preferences being their hefe, kiltlifter, and IPA offerings."

We consume our meals at this establishment on a minimum of two occasions per week, as we take advantage of the affordable pricing and superior culinary offerings. Although my personal preference tends towards Thai cuisine, I must admit that the fare served here boasts an impressive array of flavors, particularly in regards to the chicken with garlic sauce accompanied by chicken wings. While it may seem unconventional, I genuinely relish the taste of those wings.

"I am thoroughly enamored with this establishment, as it embodies the precise qualities I have been seeking in a dance studio. Following my participation in multiple classes, I have become thoroughly captivated by the unique combination of physical exertion and enjoyment that it offers. As an individual in my thirties who was seeking a dance studio that strikes a balance between recreational activity and rigorous exercise without the pressure of performances or recitals, I have found this venue to be ideally suited to my preferences."

"My son and I have an immense fondness for this establishment, which serves as our preferred dining venue. The Ecuadorian tamales and seco de pollo are culinary masterpieces that we highly recommend. Additionally, the apple soda available here is quite refreshing. It is important to note that the service provided by the restaurant's staff may be somewhat leisurely, as they operate with a genuinely familial and relaxed approach. Therefore, if you prefer a more tranquil dining experience, this location may be ideal for you. However, if you are seeking prompt and attentive service, you might consider visiting a different eatery, such as Olive Garden, where the staff is more proactive in ensuring your satisfaction."

This is our favorite place in Vegas hands down. I have been coming here for 10 years now and it is the only place we party when in Vegas. The band is awesome! The crowds are always fun. I just can't say enough great things about Nine Fine. Anyone who has been a regular knows what I mean!

"I have an immense fondness for the eatery's welcoming ambiance and diverse culinary offerings; my anticipation for a future visit is palpable, as I eagerly yearn for another opportunity to partake in their delectable poultry dish infused with the essence of fragrant basil - truly a gastronomic delight that elicits a contented 'ummm' of satisfaction."

My spouse and I opted to conduct an exploratory visit to this novel establishment, and we were thoroughly impressed by the overall experience. Upon entering, we were greeted by Jessie and Brandon, who would subsequently provide us with hospitable and attentive service throughout our duration at the bar. Their cordial demeanor and assiduous attention ensured that our needs were consistently met, rendering our visit exceptionally enjoyable. 

I opted for the macaroni and cheese, which was served sans meat, and I must unequivocally assert that it was, without a shadow of a doubt, the most scrumptious macaroni and cheese I have had the pleasure of consuming. This dish diverges from the standard, uninspired macaroni and cheese, boasting an array of distinct flavors and a subtle yet satisfying piquancy courtesy of the green chilies, all without overwhelming my taste buds. 

My spouse relished the Pub Burger, and his effusive praise subsequent to devouring it underscored his unwavering enthusiasm for its rich flavors. Notably, the presence of an egg within the burger proved a novel aspect for him, but he embraced it wholeheartedly and expressed his eagerness to replicate the experience during our forthcoming visit. 

Although we do not partake in beer, the venue's provision of a bar, coupled with Jessie's remarkable skill in crafting margaritas, satiated our desire for a delightful beverage. In fact, we may opt to sample their wine offerings during our next visit, given their extensive selection. 

In conclusion, this novel establishment has earned our unwavering endorsement, and we eagerly anticipate our return, primarily due to my unrelenting yearning for that exquisite macaroni and cheese.

"GLUTEN FREE FRIENDLY!!! We had an exquisite dining experience at this establishment last evening! WOW! We were afforded the luxury of sitting outside by the water in Las Vegas, which offered a picturesque ambiance akin to being transported to a different location altogether, aside from the arid desert climate. The patio boasts misters that effectively regulated the external temperature, creating a comfortable setting for al fresco dining. Upon entering the eatery, one encounters an impressive wine store with an extensive selection of reasonably priced wines. Patrons can select any bottle from the collection, pair it with their meal for a mere $10 surcharge, and indulge in a delightful wine and dine experience! The hospitality we received was exceptional! Our server and the culinary expert demonstrated a willingness to accommodate our dietary requirements and apprise us of ingredient specifics and potential allergens. The restaurant features live musical performances, which included a skilled guitarist during our visit. His talent was truly captivating. From the menu, we opted to initiate our culinary journey with the burrata cheese and heirloom tomato salad, accompanied by the soup of the day - a rich butternut squash complemented by crab meat - which was utterly sublime! For our main courses, we savored the scallops partnered with tomato and baby broccoli, as well as the seared swordfish garnished with a zesty red pepper sauce. The portion sizes were generous, leaving us thoroughly satiated! We eagerly anticipate our return to sample the remaining menu items that we regretfully missed out on during our initial visit. The sole drawback worth mentioning is the necessity for the restaurant to revamp their online menu to showcase several novel dishes that appear delectable and intriguing."

The occurrence of a particularly unique and specialized requirement pertaining to an external entryway prompted us to seek out the assistance of various retailers, including Home Depot's competitors; however, it was only Home Depot's sales representatives who demonstrated a willingness to go above and beyond in their endeavors to identify and provide a tailored solution that met our specific needs. Following the acquisition of the door, a significantly greater amount of effort than what is typically expected was necessary in order to facilitate its installation, a process that was executed with exceptional precision by a highly skilled and meticulous installer who ensured that the surrounding area was thoroughly cleaned and free of debris upon completion of the work. Notably, this entire experience was made available to us at a price point that was not only competitive but indeed advantageous. Our sincere gratitude extends to each and every individual involved in this transaction.

As a nascent entrepreneur, I had an arrears of two years in submitting my commercial levies, which was a consequence of my unfamiliarity with the intricacies of fiscal compliance. However, Lizeth, an employee of iQ Taxx, displayed exceptional decorum and patience in addressing my numerous queries, providing exhaustive explanations that clarified any ambiguities I harbored. Moreover, she apprised me of the advancement of the task from inception to culmination, ensuring that I remained cognizant of the proceedings at every juncture. My interaction with iQ Taxx has been extremely satisfactory, and I would enthusiastically recommend their services to any burgeoning venture seeking to navigate the labyrinthine realm of taxation. (509 tokens)

Always have, since the inception of this establishment, been a patron of this esteemed venue, and it is with great pleasure that I continue to frequent this location, as the culinary offerings and beverages served herein are of superior quality and have consistently met, nay, exceeded my expectations. 

Upon my most recent visit, I was taken aback by the remarkable recall of one of the youthful servers, who not only recognized my personage, but also recalled my predilection for a particular variety of sustenance and beverage. It is truly astounding to witness such dedication to customer service and attention to detail manifest in the memorization of a patron's preferences. 

I would enthusiastically endorse this establishment to any individual seeking a delectable repast or refreshing beverage, as well as a hospitable atmosphere in which to relax and enjoy said fare.

"I recently had the pleasure of partaking in a culinary excursion at this esteemed establishment, and I must say that the experience was nothing short of exceptional. In commemoration of my natal day, I opted to indulge in their delectable steak entree, which proved to be a judicious decision, as it was cooked to perfection and boasted an unparalleled tenderness that left my taste buds in a state of pure delight. Furthermore, the hospitality displayed by the staff was of the highest caliber, as they exhibited an unwavering commitment to ensuring that my dining experience was nothing short of optimal. Of particular note was the manager, who took the time to visit my table on multiple occasions, thereby demonstrating a genuine concern for my satisfaction and well-being. As a token of their appreciation, I was also presented with a complimentary dessert, which served as the proverbial 'icing on the cake' to an already extraordinary dining excursion."

"Indubitably, my most optimal dining experience in Las Vegas, and indeed, in quite some time. This esteemed establishment unquestionably merits all five stars for their exceptional service, culinary offerings, ambiance, and overall experience. 

Service: 
We arrived sans reservation and were apprised of a waiting period of one hour and thirty minutes, prompting us to take a stroll and observe the Fountains at Bellagio spectacle. Subsequently, our hostess informed us that upon our return, she would provide us with a buzzer. Following the display, we returned, awaiting only a brief three-minute interval before being seated. We requested a table on the balcony, and despite solely having a side balcony table available, the staff graciously accommodated our request, allowing us to patiently await the cleaning of a central table without the slightest inconvenience. Our server maintained a jovial demeanor and offered insightful recommendations of dishes to sample. 

Food: 
We initiated our culinary journey with the delectable Duck confit, accompanied by a side of spinach complemented by cranberries, and oh my goodness, it was utterly sublime! The duck literally melted in my mouth, leaving me in a state of gastronomic nirvana. I opted for the expertly cooked steak, paired with hand-carved French fries and adorned with caramelized onions, while my companion savored the seafood special. The fare was not only exquisitely prepared but also remarkably satisfying. 

I wholeheartedly endorse Mon Ami Gabi for a delightful dining experience and eagerly anticipate my next visit, craving another taste of their heavenly duck confit."

I must admit that my initial reluctance to engage in a rental agreement with this particular establishment was precipitated by an abundance of unfavorable critiques and subpar evaluations; nevertheless, I am now grateful that I chose to disregard such reservations. As a financially challenged college student and career transitioner, I opted to avail myself of their services during the Thanksgiving holiday week, primarily due to the fact that they offered the most competitive pricing through Expedia's booking platform. Upon arriving at the airport parking area, I was greeted by Jim, the shuttle driver, who exhibited remarkable benevolence by providing me with detailed directions to a neighboring shopping center and even took the time to write them down for my benefit. The gentlemen stationed at the counter were equally as cordial, engaging in a convivial conversation with the clients ahead of me, who hailed from New York. The process of checking in was remarkably efficient and straightforward, thanks to the fact that I had previously procured insurance coverage through Expedia, resulting in my obtaining my vehicle in less than ten minutes after arriving at the counter. The assortment of automobiles available in the parking lot predominantly consisted of recent models, ranging from 2011 to 2012. During my excursions to the mall and South Carolina, I diligently adhered to Jim's directions, which proved to be faultless. I would like to extend my sincere gratitude to the staff members for facilitating my sojourn in South Carolina and express my appreciation for Jim's assistance in guiding me to various destinations. Based on my positive experience, I wholeheartedly endorse this rental agency, and I hope that my testimonial will serve to alleviate any apprehensions harbored by potential patrons.

I had to go from B to E, and it only took about 10 minutes. I thought that I'd have to change terminals but nope! Great shops and restaurants, very clean, easy to get around, beautiful gardens inside too

"Our most recent culinary discovery has rapidly become our preferred dining establishment. The youthful personnel at this eatery exemplify exceptional customer service, which we believe stems from the company's cultural values. Their diverse array of delectable options, including soups and salads, has captured the palates of both my spouse and myself, such that we now frequent this venue on a weekly basis. However, we do lament the absence of nutritional information pertaining to their menu items, despite our repeated inquiries and attempts to access said data via their website."

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment. The proprietors are exceptional individuals who have demonstrated a remarkable dedication to their craft. I had the pleasure of introducing my family to their delectable gelato, which yielded an unwavering satisfaction. Each flavor is carefully conceived and executed utilizing only the freshest ingredients, resulting in a truly unique and tantalizing experience for the taste buds. My personal favorites were the sweet corn, chocolate mousse, and pistachio varieties. The latter was particularly noteworthy, as its rich, velvety texture and subtle nutty undertones left an indelible impression on my palate. The hospitable owner, Luigi, went above and beyond to ensure that my children were similarly enthralled by the array of flavors available. Their joy was palpable, and it was heartening to witness such genuine enthusiasm. It is encouraging to see a business thriving in the downtown area, fostering a sense of community through its commitment to quality and authenticity. I would highly recommend a visit to this gelateria; indeed, I am confident that one's expectations will be not only met but exceeded. In addition, the proprietors have announced plans to offer pints, quarts, and cakes in the near future, further expanding the scope of their culinary offerings. Furthermore, they intend to incorporate homemade cookies into their repertoire, destined to become the foundation for delectable ice cream sandwiches."

"This particular buffet stands out as an exceptional dining experience, boasting an impressive array of delectable offerings that cater to diverse palates. While the King crab selection is no longer available at a discounted rate, the culinary quality remains consistently high. My personal preference lies with the succulent roast beef, although I made a point to sample each station, and my expectations were thoroughly exceeded."

Due to a flight delay, US Airways booked me here for the night. What a hotel!

A shuttle arrived at the airport within 15 mins of me calling, with a wonderfully friendly driver, Eddie. He helped me find a place to order dinner from while the very helpful front desk attendant got me checked in. They were more than helpful and went above their expectations.

The room was splendid, with a kitchen, living room with TV, bedroom with TV, and very spacious bathroom, all with new appliances and remodeling. More than enough towels and complimentary coffee. 

For breakfast, there were enough options to have three full meals! Everything was fresh and tasty.

If I ever get delayed again, I will be very happy indeed to return to the Hyatt House.

I absolutely love this place. It's always busy but I've never had to wait too long for a table. The food is great and the portions are perfect. Everything on the menu is good and the bagels are always fresh.

Ordered from Eat 24 Tempe, and it was a great experience. Guy took 20 minutes to delivery our food, not bad at all! Ordered the panang curry, yellow curry (thai hot) and the egg rolls. Everything was certainly up to par and was worth the little research. If you like Thai, I'm most sure you'll have a great experience at this place.

If you relish meat, or rather, if your fondness for it knows no bounds, you will be transported to culinary heaven upon exiting this Brazilian restaurant. The menu is relatively uncomplicated, and, needless to say, nearly everyone chooses, with excellent judgment, The Turnstile, which is the establishment's specialty. For a mere $30, this menu option will allow you to sample an impressive 10 types of meat, which the servers will offer you regularly, albeit not quite in a repetitive manner, as they circulate from table to table with a skewer of meat and serve it voluntarily. After the tenth serving, it is highly likely that you will no longer feel hungry. Nevertheless, if you wish to continue indulging in the meats offered, you may certainly do so! Additionally, rice and a small side of salsa are served, both of which complement the more tender cuts of meat perfectly. An absolute must-visit for all unapologetic carnivores!

"This establishment exudes an ambiance of exceptional quality, fostered by the cordial demeanor of Brenda and her team, who unwaveringly demonstrate a sincere affection for their clientele. The culinary offerings, though unpretentious in nature, are meticulously prepared with care and attention to detail, ensuring an unparalleled freshness that permeates every dish. While the hospitable service is generally characterized by its warmth and friendliness, periods of heightened patronage may occasionally result in a slight diminution of efficiency. However, this minor drawback is more than compensated for by the welcoming atmosphere that pervades the premises, cultivating a sense of conviviality among both regular patrons and newcomers alike, and making the experience an altogether pleasant and satisfying one. Additionally, the prices charged for these delectable fare and excellent service are eminently reasonable, thereby rendering this eatery an unmitigated delight for those seeking a truly gratifying dining experience."

It is indeed a pleasure to indulge in delectable pastries and converse with acquaintances at an establishment that exudes an atmosphere of authenticity, such as Boulangerie Le Fournil. Prior to embarking on our journey to Boston, where we had the privilege of showcasing our artistic talents, we decided to pay a visit to this charming bakery, primarily due to our familiarity with Heidi, who is affiliated with the establishment. Upon entering the premises, we were immediately struck by the alluring aroma of freshly baked goods, which served as a harbinger of the culinary delights that awaited us. The assortment of pastries and breads on offer was truly impressive, with each item exhibiting a level of craftsmanship and attention to detail that is increasingly uncommon in today's fast-paced, mass-produced world. Particularly noteworthy were the croissants, whose flaky texture and rich flavor evoked memories of similar treats savored during our travels throughout Europe. Similarly, the tarts, with their delicate pastry shells and bursting-with-flavor fillings, were a joy to consume. It is worth mentioning that even seemingly mundane items, such as chocolate milk, were elevated to new heights of excellence through the judicious use of high-quality ingredients and a commitment to artisanal techniques. The overall experience was so enjoyable that we felt compelled to express our gratitude to Heidi and the other friendly staff members, and we look forward to revisiting this enchanting boulangerie in the future.

This range is unparalleled in its excellence, offering an unforgettable experience for shooters of all proficiency levels.  Its reasonable pricing is merely one of its numerous virtues; the facilities available for shooting are truly remarkable.  Our group of six individuals had the privilege of utilizing their premier skeet shooting range during our recent visit, and the staff members supervising this unique pre-dove season event were extremely helpful and offered valuable guidance throughout our shooting experience.  My only regret is that I don't reside in closer proximity to Phoenix, thereby enabling me to partake in this exceptional shooting range more frequently.  I wholeheartedly endorse it to anyone seeking to enhance their marksmanship abilities or simply looking for an enjoyable day out with friends.

"This culinary establishment boasts an impressive array of delectable dishes, with a consistent quality that is unparalleled in its genre.
